Reviews.Content: It is a higher sensitivity radar detecter I have had. Little noisy, when I pass airpaort everyday.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9945
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Very good product from Cobra.  The included windshield mount works great if you allow the rear of the unit to rest on the dash.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9345 14-Band Radar/Laser Detector
Reviews.Author: JBlake
Reviews.Content: This radar detector works great.  It has various settings to reduce false alarms.  It helps avoid speeding tickets.

Reviews.Title: Cobra xrs
Reviews.Author: Marie J. Workman "ollie1514"
Reviews.Content: The cord was bad and kept blowing fuses.  I had to pay $18 to replace the cord at best buy so I could use it.  I should have send it back.  The item works good now that the cord was replaced.

Reviews.Title: Bad when cold
Reviews.Author: F. Nevells
Reviews.Content: It works good but when you first start your car it will beep constantly  and show KA band 2 for about 5 minutes until it warms up.

Reviews.Title: Eagle Eye
Reviews.Author: §°§ I win. "Still Charging..."
Reviews.Content: I used this excellently described radar detector for about two weeks.  I live in a busy city and like to get out of it when I can, so on the way to work and any where else I am always looking for speed traps.  Well, if I wore glasses this might be better than them, but it's really not for those who would like to know in ADVANCE that a police officer is a bit up the road gunning for them.  If you like some beeps before you hear sirens, then this is for you!  Even will tell you the band you just got hit by...  I may be a little harsh, but to be fair I seriously think this unit was defective and needed proper tuning.  I did get alerts though.  on the range from 1 to 5;  If a cop was right behind me (as did actually happen) about 50 feet back you will get a level 1 alert.  If they are infront of you about 200 feet is the warning for the lowest level alert, which also resides in the false alarm level.  I saw a 4 as the officer passed me and never once got a 5 out of this thing.  Very weak signal and processor in this I guess.  RX65 is best bet, spend the money if you want the range is what this experience taught me.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Performance
Reviews.Author: David Marshall
Reviews.Content: This radar detector is not sensitive enough. I see the police cars as the radar detector alerts me. I got a ticket in Alabama on I-20 near Talladega, the unit alerted me as the Officer turned his lights on. The Officer was about 200 feet away at the time.

Reviews.Title: 50-50 Chance
Reviews.Author: Joshua North
Reviews.Content: I recently bought the Cobra XRS 9345 14 band radar/laser detector for a road trip from upstate NY down the Jersey shore to Wildwood, NJ, about a 6 hour ride. During that time this product worked great 50% of the time, and the other 50% it was a complete let down. The biggest shock of this product was it's changing range of operation. Sometimes it would pick up a police car sitting 1-2 miles up the road. Other times it would not go off until I was 20 feet from the cop car. The X band goes off way too much, often false alarms, and the K band really never goes off. The laser gun also seems to have terrible range. I visibly saw the state trooper aiming the laser gun at me and the dectector still took another 3-5 seconds to go off. However, as mentioned, sometimes it works great. On the trip there was a large curve in the highway, with a police car hiding behind a wall about a mile down the curve. The Kc Band went off a solid .5 miles before I even saw the cop, giving plenty of time to slow down. Overall, you're taking a 50-50 chance with this product based on my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Great detector for price
Reviews.Author: Royce Wiley Jr. "r"
Reviews.Content: It takes a bit to get used to but I think this is a very good detector for the price. I leave it on Highway mode and get very few false alerts. I'm still learning the range of dectection. Sometimes it doesn't alert until it has a 'line of sight' while other times it has alerted and the cop is on the other side of a hill or a long way off. This may be because many cops and using 'pop mode'.  Another learning point is the scale. Many times I'll pass a cop and the detector has alerted but it rarely goes full scale. All said I'm very happy with this dector. If it says K or KA band you better smile! Hope this helps. Oh yea, when I was looking many reviews said the window suction mount didn't work very well. So far, I've had no problem at all. Good Luck and Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9945
Reviews.Author: Manuel macias
Reviews.Content: This unit does the job at a lower price. I like the ability to change the color to match my car inside lights. The emergency vehicle feature was a big surprise, the alarm sounds and in a few seconds an ambulance would pass by. Of course the alerts for X-Bands radar etc... work very well. This system is worth the price and it works great! I am looking into getting another one for my other car.

Reviews.Title: Works amazing!
Reviews.Author: PandaBear
Reviews.Content: Skeptical at first when trying to buy my first radar detector, and this one was the perfect choice.  This detects pretty much anything and everything, but with Intellimute it weeds those other bands out.  I always know if there is a police officer at least 1-2 miles before I even see them.  Just be aware that officers may not always have their radars on.  One of their techniques is coasting, where they turn their radar one for a short period then turn it off and follow right behind you.  They compare their speed on there speedometer to how fast you're going.This radar detector is amazing, I just bought one for my girlfriend because she wanted one.  Though she may not drive fast, its just an extra security precaution.

Reviews.Title: Lasted about 12 months
Reviews.Author: Brandon Pack "LittleButty"
Reviews.Content: LED display died after about 12 months and then the entire unit died a couple months after that despite never moving from my dashboard.

Reviews.Title: Already saved me twice
Reviews.Author: Dst
Reviews.Content: Just got my first detector. It is a little big but I have a SUV so no problem. I do not speed much, but just enough to get into trouble sometimes. One of these times my detector warned me about a radar, then two miles later a laser! Even gave me warning time with a laser (but not much). One thing, the suction cups are very hard to use. I use mine with a bean bag dash holder with excellent results. I got it at Amazon's discounted price and may get another for my wife.

Reviews.Title: Has already saved me.
Reviews.Author: DaveK Miami
Reviews.Content: I had the Cobra 12 band and the speaker went bad after 4 years.  This one is great.  The only thing it won't do is that the iMute feature will not pick up the RPM reading from my engine, so that feature does not work.  I don't get many false alarms though, onlywhen passing by a store that has automatic door openers.  Also at times I believe it goes off when it picks up signals from anti-collision monitors in the bumpers of cars in front me.  Not sure about that though.  Short story, I am glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: FALSE ALERTS
Reviews.Author: Elexia Green
Reviews.Content: After only 14 months of use it constantly gives false alerts on K band.  For the price I would expect years of service as other models I have purchased.

Reviews.Title: Great radar/laser detector!
Reviews.Author: Pennguy
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife as her old detector was ancient. I have the model below this and it has never done me wrong. False alarms are often but overall this has excellent range and has saved her on many instances to work already.

Reviews.Title: Not what i had expected
Reviews.Author: josue ortiz
Reviews.Content: Goes off in middle of no where, and not alerts right infront of cop cars, tested it since dad is one, The compass is way off never accurate what so ever.

Reviews.Title: Not so great for finding the police...
Reviews.Author: TechnologyAddict
Reviews.Content: It's not so great for finding where the police are hiding, but it's amazing at letting you know if you're passing a store with automatic doors!!!! I still haven't quite figured out the ins and outs of this product, but if you're not willing to pay the extremely high prices of high quality radar detectors, this is a decent second-line option. It's pretty hit-or-miss, but it has kept me out of trouble a few times.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Joseph Young
Reviews.Content: Used it for my cross country trip from New York to California. Worked flawlessly. Picked up every State and Highway Patrol Radar. Including road workers and school zone radars. I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR $$$
Reviews.Author: Josh Crick
Reviews.Content: If you like having to CONSTANTLY reaching to the windshield to hit the mute button, buy this radar detector. If you want something that will work AS advertised, spend the extra money on a different model ( I would probably go with a different company altogether, Cobra sucks ) I've calibrated this detector EXACTLY how the instructions say, it works great as a compass, as for actually working as a radar detector it's useless. It CONSTANTLY sets off Ka band every other block while driving through the city. Switch to highway mode, and it seems just passing cars that have radar or GPS in the windshield ( I've had this unit for awhile now, and you can see people who have either radar or GPS on their windshield ) the Cobra XRS beeps as if there's a cop right in the vicinity. I drive a 370z and need something that will actually work, not create an extra beeping track to the music I'm listening to! -

Reviews.Title: This was a gift.
Reviews.Author: L. Davis "Nana of 4"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband. He loves it. It is sleek and it talks to him sometimes more than I do v

Reviews.Title: Cobra
Reviews.Author: Jody gollihugh
Reviews.Content: Works just as well as I thought I would. I Still drive with caution. But overall I enjoy this item.

Reviews.Title: radar detector
Reviews.Author: Harley Gold
Reviews.Content: Works well but doesn't stick to window well.  A little difficult to set up.  Heavier than others.  Does the job.

Reviews.Title: This is a great product
Reviews.Author: Hollie K.
Reviews.Content: After you read the manual on this and get it setup, it works great. I have even got several people to ask where it came from.

Reviews.Title: Works Well
Reviews.Author: Lori thomas Domke
Reviews.Content: I had to get used to the different beeps and buzzes but now that I am this has been a life saver.  It works best on the windshield but works ok down by the console.

Reviews.Title: DOA!
Reviews.Author: Mr RG
Reviews.Content: unit didn't even turn on... disappointed because i was looking forward to testing it.  luckily had another model (newer version) on order and used that one instead.

Reviews.Title: Cobra has a short life span
Reviews.Author: c.rest
Reviews.Content: When it works it seems to function adequately.  The cord is horrible; the plug broke, exposing wires and causing the detector to stop working.  A replacement cord worked well.  Now the detector just stopped working.  Less than two years of spotty service for $129.  This is my second Cobra - I should have learned from the last one.  Cobra is just not durable or reliable;  no more for me.

Reviews.Title: It works but not enough warning time
Reviews.Author: Robert D Thomas
Reviews.Content: The detector is easy to mount and operate, but by the time it alarms you can see the law enforcement officer and he can see you

Reviews.Title: Fla Man..
Reviews.Author: wayne
Reviews.Content: So far so good.Does everything that it says it will..The menu is easy to use,and be sure to go through it because not everything is turned on from the factory..not happy with the POP mode..goes off on everything in my area..But all in all works great..

Reviews.Title: Started Malfunctioning at Two Years of Age
Reviews.Author: Courtney S. Putnam "C.S. Putnam"
Reviews.Content: Two years old and I am seeing my first malfunction of this unit.  The screen saver, which is a tracking one-pixel dot, will not deactivate when a detection is made.  My work around for this malfunction is a complete user reset.  I have had to do the reset twice in the last month.  Honestly, I was hoping to get more than only two years of use out of this unit before it started throwing in the towel.  It still detects, it just doesn't show the information on the screen.  With that said, I will tell you a little about this unit when it was in its heyday.The unit is heavy.  It bounces like a rubber ball when it is attached to the windshield.  My family cannot tell if the alert voice is male or female.  Looks like Cobra went gender-neutral when they programmed this voice alert.  The unit detects fairly well.  I live in the country and our Sherriff has nothing better than the K-Band equipment, so this unit does just fine.  Detects the crap out of 7-11 and Walgreen's automatic doors though!  I keep it in highway mode all the time.  I know where the false alerts are located, so I just ignore them.  The screen can be changed to several colors.  I like blue, but since I have been resetting it lately, it has stayed in the default, multi-colored screen mode.  The unit CAN be fitted with a GPS unit, but when I tried to order it, the order wouldn't process.  I tried several times and then just gave up.  I have NAV on my car anyway, so the benefits really aren't worth it to me.  The GPS add-on would probably be more suited to someone who lives in the city.  I think the system can receive updates of speed traps and things like that.Overall, the unit has been pretty good.  Next time, I will look for a smaller, lighter unit.  Oh, and one last thing.  Initially, I set this thing on my dash and let the cord hang down the front of the dash panel.  After only three months of being in that location, the curly cord has already "rubbed" a blemish in the plastic fascia of my dash.  I ended up relocating the unit to the top of my windshield and I now let the power cord dangle from the unit straight to the 12VDC power outlet.

Reviews.Title: GOT THIS 3/12/14 AND  found the suction cup ( and where they want you tp enstall it BAD) 2113 buick Encloave
Reviews.Author: THOMAS M. MUCCI
Reviews.Content: if I install it on the bottom the windshield( where they say) I could never reach it , to turn on or off. my dash is a no no - because Velcro hard to remove after a long period. Can't install  in the middle of the dash , there isn't  a large enough spot. My bad for having a vehicle that is not cobra friendly- cord is not long enough. plug on cord very hard to put in, and this will cause the  the wire  to fail because you push on it. Trying to jury  rig something up so I can use it, but  . I have it  tied to the right side of the dash , where it is to low and the rear detection won't work because it is obstructed. hope I don't have to send it back. more later  when I get to use it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the price
Reviews.Author: JSOMM
Reviews.Content: I loved this item, however I have actually had better which is the only reason I docked a star. However it does the job and is up for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Frank Ryan
Reviews.Content: Cant hear as good as other one I had. But it picks up alot more signals. Better mount than the old ones.

Reviews.Title: Accurate sometimes too sensitive
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: Picks up random k band signals which i was told by people who own this not to worry about. so mainly i keep my eye out for KA Band which is police radar. It is extremely poweful with distance yet sometimes it should be a little more responsive with time.

Reviews.Title: So far I have got two fines in the same place
Reviews.Author: Mehrad Rustai "Pictures"
Reviews.Content: So far I have got two fines in the same place. It did not make any sound. I usually pass through the same road.

Reviews.Title: Catch me if you can!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Farruggio
Reviews.Content: So far I have had no problems with the XRS 9945. The display screen is easy to read and the audio warnings are clear. I've gotten a few false readings but for the most part I've been very happy with this product. A frequent misconception about radar detectors is they are not cop car detectors, they are radar detectors! With this product you will have more than a fair warning at the possibility of a radar trap. Happy cruising!

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: claude
Reviews.Content: I stopped using it after a few months because it is unreliable. I downloaded the free app "Waze" and have found it much more helpful

Reviews.Title: Decent Radar
Reviews.Author: Wesley McSparin
Reviews.Content: This radar, for what it costs, is a good value.  It does pick up radar signals pretty well but a lot of the time it picks up signals that are not from cops.  Bottom line, it's saved me a few tickets but be careful because sometimes it doesn't pick up a signal until the cop is right up on you.

Reviews.Title: useless due to false alarms
Reviews.Author: Thomas Mueller "tmspecial"
Reviews.Content: I used the Cobra radar detector for 6 months before all the false alarms drove me crazy.99% of all alarms I received were false alarms.I replaced it with an Escort PASSPORT Max which works flawlessly.The Escort has very few false alarms.I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Kristie Fey
Reviews.Content: So much going on its kinda too good.... My only ehh about this is it picks up so many types of "radar signals" that unless you study and memorize all the codes in the manual, it's hard to know the exact warning of.

Reviews.Title: College Student
Reviews.Author: Trevor Richmond
Reviews.Content: Lets just say I haven't gotten a ticket yet. Doesn't mean its perfect, but its doing the job so far.  Once I get a ticket while using this thing I will edit my post. I do drive often for 3 hours going to college and home and haven't gotten in trouble yet.

Reviews.Title: Quality has gone down compass does not work any more even after recalibration
Reviews.Author: sailsail
Reviews.Content: Quality has gone down compass does not work any more even after recalibrationThe radar detection works great however the compass does fail. I have also noticed that the volume will change on its own.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Good detector for the price. Doesn't pick up every signal out there but goes off around banks or convenience stores.

Reviews.Title: very good item
Reviews.Author: robert lavallee
Reviews.Content: very good item. fast shipping. easy to use and good value. recommended to everone who need something like that. looking to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Works okay, but the accessory it came with are not so good
Reviews.Author: Frank Yu
Reviews.Content: I don't use it too often and it is really a impulse buy.I can only say that I wish the mounting accessories could be stronger.

Reviews.Title: cobra 9745 radar detector
Reviews.Author: GREGORY WRIGHT
Reviews.Content: Works great,saved me on several occasions sinced purchased. I experienced few pop alerts at times,but the range is excellent for the money.Would recommend this radar detector.

Reviews.Title: It's a bit large, in this day and time of compact everything...but works great
Reviews.Author: Larry Lee
Reviews.Content: I let my whistler was much smaller and was ten years old, so I let it go when I traded cars. I ordered this one and was surprised at how big it is. It does have the red light camera detector, which is a good feature.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: John Rado
Reviews.Content: like it works good tells mewhen the police close by.told some friends about itthey will look into it

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Selma Bock
Reviews.Content: As soon as this came I hooked it up right away. It saved me from a few tickets. Happy with it

Reviews.Title: best
Reviews.Author: dimov
Reviews.Content: Hello everyone, this is what I expected, everything works korektno.Zdraveyte all, that's what I expected, everything works korektno.Zdraveyte all, that's what I expected, everything works correctly.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: fsu101
Reviews.Content: The product was as described. It has worked great and we could not be happier! I recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Like my detector
Reviews.Author: Derrick Garby
Reviews.Content: Radar detector works well there were some false alarms but has saved me from many tickets one traveling on the interstate and in the city. At least I slow down and drive safer

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: DrRuth
Reviews.Content: Arrived promptly and in good shape.  It does the job I needed it for.  The item looks to be of good quality materials.  Would buy again ...

Reviews.Title: NO MORE TICKETS
Reviews.Author: M. Mayer "CANDLE GURU"
Reviews.Content: I got stopped a few times for speeding. I was told by a DEA agent the procedure to stop the policeman from issuing you a ticket & It has worked both times. Open all your windows & put your hands on the steering wheel. Be friendly.The Cobra works perfectly. I mounted it on the driver's side. When it hits over 3 I slow down. This I know has saved me from tickets. It's been 15 years & no tickets.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: james huang
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly as I expected.  If you are looking for a radar detector which can help you save some money for fine, it is the one. After all, please be a save driver for the sake of you and others.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Billy Waldrop
Reviews.Content: Had it for about a week now. It picks up any radar within plenty of distance. Great options to customize. Would recommend to a freiend.

Reviews.Title: bad product
Reviews.Author: Pablo
Reviews.Content: no goodonly serves to detect entenas cellular telephone, radar does not detectsometimes try to detect the radar and did not work

Reviews.Title: bought for friend who loves it
Reviews.Author: Viola C. Horek
Reviews.Content: I don't know much about it as I bought it for a friend who says it's been working great and saving him from getting speeding tickets

Reviews.Title: Radar detector
Reviews.Author: Thomas Ray
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing product for a great price. I just bought for of them for family and friends as gifts; and I've used this same model in my car for over two years now and I am ticket free. The volume is really loud unlike other brands which is always a plus. This is definitely worth the buy.

Reviews.Title: this is poop
Reviews.Author: Larkin E. Stensrude
Reviews.Content: crap! always goes off right when you turn it on.  I have another Cobra and its much better! this model sucks

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Rosemarie Segura
Reviews.Content: I like the features.  I bought this product for my son, unfortunately it was stolen.  I need to order another one but this is discontinued and I wonder why.

Reviews.Title: it's okay - I would probably not re-buy it though, I'd opt for a better brand
Reviews.Author: D. Ron
Reviews.Content: A lot of false alarms, even in city mode and having turned off X and K bands - but that's more my location.Passed a cop or two and it never beeped - possible they didn't have any radar/lidar going on, but stillpassed 1 cop who had a speed trap on the highway - no noise.accurately warned me of every other radar trap (and digital speed monitors)

Reviews.Title: I've been using radar detectors for 20 + years. Don't buy it's not worth the money!
Reviews.Author: trebor207
Reviews.Content: I should have listened to that little voice that said buy the whisler. After buying this detector the first thing I noticed was the constant false alerts. The only way to cut down on the false alerts is to cut everything off in the options menu. The next thing was after using it for 2 months it just quit working. So now I'm waiting on Cobra and my warranty claim. I wish I could get my money back or better yet never spent it on the Cobra to begin with.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this product. No complaints, works very well and the features are nice. I woulddefinitely recommend this product to anyonelooking.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Robert E Gilmore Sr
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, covers a number of frequencies, has traffic light camera feature as well.  I recommend it to anyone who is looking for a radar detector

Reviews.Title: Plenty of warning, but wish you could turn off X band alerts.
Reviews.Author: Cowboy Mike
Reviews.Content: Spend a few bucks more and get the Escort.  This one works well, but the X-Band alarms are very annoying.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: AZ-Pete
Reviews.Content: I have owned three cobra radar detectors, this (9945) is the only one that I have been disappointed with. I have three complaints they are:1. compass works , however it shows you are going east when you are really going west, the north and south directions are fine.2. Suction cups don't hold the device, it's just too heavy.3. The sound alert does't always work. It picks up the signal and it registers on the screen, but the sound is sometimes missing.

Reviews.Title: Buy the Cobra XRS 9745.  It's great!
Reviews.Author: FRANCINE SWIFT
Reviews.Content: I purchased an earlier Cobra radar model in 1990 because I drove long distances to and from work and was thoroughly pleased with it.  It saved me from getting at least ten speeding tickets over the years.  I really liked it but forgot to retrieve it when I sold that car.  Today, I drive long distance to and from work and invariably see three or four inconspicuous and unmarked radar-equipped police cars strategically positioned after curves, downward from hills, and nestled between bushes along roads and freeways.  For these reason I sought to purchase another one.I researched the Cobra and other websites and compared to what other radar detectors offered, but concluded that the Cobra XRS 9745 was exactly what I wanted and at the price I'd expected to pay.  I can hear both the beep and voice warnings above radio broadcasts and can read the warning notice easily.  I use it nearly everyday.  On a recent trip to southern Indiana, it alerted me in plenty of time of every speed trap out there as well as any nearby ambulances or emergency vehicles AND a train, but I could not see it.The only problem is that the coiled cord seems a bit short and the velcro padding failed to stick to my just cleaned dashboard.Regardless, I RECOMMEND this device and believe anyone who purchases it WILL be pleased for making a wise decision.  Happy ticket-free driving! js

Reviews.Title: Really
Reviews.Author: charles k ledford
Reviews.Content: to early to tell.Seem like it picks up radar after it's to late.I would have been busted when it goes off

Reviews.Title: you know you want it.
Reviews.Author: C. Ginther
Reviews.Content: This thing is pretty slick, it catches a good majority of signals and has already saved me twice. GET IT!

Reviews.Title: OK but not great
Reviews.Author: Jackie Wackie
Reviews.Content: Some other people we know with this same device got a cord with theirs that enables GPS.  I don't recall any mention about that in the description.  It's helpfulness is limited. I don't feel like this was money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Nice radar detector.
Reviews.Author: RS
Reviews.Content: A very effective detector which has nice features. Detection range is excellent and accurate. It covers all bands and has plenty of personal settings.

Reviews.Title: be smart
Reviews.Author: bryan
Reviews.Content: ya it gives false readings, i don't care, i bought it to keep my speed in check since i bought a "fast" car. nothing wrong with it radars are everywhere expect some false readings but it has saved me a few times

Reviews.Title: Cobra  Detector,third one I've owned, all good
Reviews.Author: George Nopper
Reviews.Content: works like it says without too many false readings, I could do without driving around in circles to calibrate the compus, don't need it

Reviews.Title: Streamlined detector, not too bulky.
Reviews.Author: Eric F. Cunningham "IT_user"
Reviews.Content: Outstanding device...so far; I haven't had the opportunity to put it through the paces just yet. However, Monday morning & traffic will soon tell if this device is worth the price I paid. So far; after turning it on, there were no false signals. I will try to update as I experience the functionality of the device.

Reviews.Title: Buy this, save your $$
Reviews.Author: MTB cyclist
Reviews.Content: Works just as good as the over $100 ones, and with out all the confusion and extra noises, I have used this entry level cobra one for years and never let me down!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: cecil john
Reviews.Content: it has saved me a lot of money, it automatically detect them. great to have it, I cant drive without it

Reviews.Title: I really like it!
Reviews.Author: MGuia
Reviews.Content: I am really liking this radar detector. It is easy to operate and has worked very well so far, saving me from two tickets already. Of course there are better ones out there for a lot more money, but this product delivers what it promises at a very reasonable cost.

Reviews.Title: worth every penny
Reviews.Author: RudyBaaws1362
Reviews.Content: this has been an awesome radar detector, it has already saved me from a number of tickets.  I really like the different volume setting.  I love the clarity of the screen

Reviews.Title: A good value radar detector.
Reviews.Author: Jeff G
Reviews.Content: This detector pick up radar signals as well as any detector that I have used.It gives warnings beeps when a signal is detected. The visual displayis too weak to see. There is no voice to describe the radar type that isbeing detected.

Reviews.Title: YOu must have if you have a need for speed
Reviews.Author: Erica Taylor
Reviews.Content: Does good When on a road trip and used and it picked up every cop and even picked up the unmarked cop cars love it

Reviews.Title: pretty good detector for the price
Reviews.Author: friede "über geek"
Reviews.Content: this is a pretty decent detector and i'd give it 5 stars if it would do better at filtering and if cobra would have updates for it as well. very good detector for the price.i'd initially received a defective unit but amazon replaced it immediately and cobra was very helpful with their customer service as well.

Reviews.Title: Not consistent
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I bought two at one time and they both are not working anymore. The it does not pick up signals consistently and the cord is faulty.

Reviews.Title: Cobra feedbck
Reviews.Author: Major
Reviews.Content: Because I feel that it's not complete. Shouldn't  it have come with a GPS USB locator and how do I update or upgrade the software without the PC pug in cable. One more thing, why is it that I can't buy a dashboard mount for this unit? Can u help pliz.Thanx

Reviews.Title: great value radar
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Great radar with plenty of additional features. Detects radars at very long distance. ( the ones by the side of the road at school zones and other slow traffic areas). Remember it is a radar and laser detector not a cop detector.

Reviews.Title: I have one for each car!
Reviews.Author: D. Spencer
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these for my wife's birthday 2 years ago. This year, my wife asked for another for her birthday for our other car. She has a lead foot, and it has kept us out of trouble since we started using it. Only problem was that she can never remember to move it from one car to the other when she switches for the day. Still, I'd definitely recommend it! It's not PERFECT, but no radar detector is, so use your head and still watch out (but like I said, NO trouble since buying this).

Reviews.Title: GETS THE JOB DONE
Reviews.Author: flipp
Reviews.Content: THIS DEVISE IS ADAQUATE FOR MY NEEDS IT WAS INEXPENSIVE AND WORKS WELL, IF YOU SPEND MORE MONEY YOU GET MORE FEATURES YOU MAY OR MAY NOT NEED.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good!
Reviews.Author: Dominic
Reviews.Content: For starters, this thing is well worth the money and does a decent job. On the highway it has saved me a few times. Sometimes this radar will detect a cop from a very impressive distance and sometimes it won't go off until you're right on top of one. So you still need to be careful. Now compared to my brother's escort radar which is $300 dollars, I can honestly say there isn't too much different. Cobras will pick up more false alarms and escorts are smart enough to know when there is a false alarm. Both radars still pick up cops at just about the same distance. Overall if you're debating whether to buy this or a more expensive radar, save you're money and get this. It gets the job done and you will be happy.

Reviews.Title: Broke within 7 months!
Reviews.Author: Cameron B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for fairly cheap so I am not complaining there. When I got it it was pretty straight forward install, and this unit works okay. My only complaints is the range may not be the best and most importantly after only about 6-7 months of having this it starts to act funny and is basically not working like it used to. Plus the power cord is such a cheap plastic it broke into 4 pieces on me right after the radar became useless. I would recommend it only because it did its job and you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Levi
Reviews.Content: Works great! Thing saves my a$$ if this one breaks on me I will buy another one. And got it at a great price. No problems so far out if it and the power charger.

Reviews.Title: ok for the price
Reviews.Author: Christopher Smith
Reviews.Content: No where near as good as my Escort Radar Detector, but it seems to pick up radar JUST before you can see the cop. Easy to use for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Poorly & cheeply made attachment
Reviews.Author: Conchita Evans
Reviews.Content: The radar detector works fine but the device that attaches to the windshild is cheaply made and falls off frequently especially if the windshield is cold. This will eventually cause damage to the detector.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Clyde Durbin
Reviews.Content: A bit too sensitive.  Difference between city and Highway - City turned off all but X detection.  Surrounding town police use Ka and Ka and K go off all the time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent! But...
Reviews.Author: E. Sherer
Reviews.Content: Excellent radar detector. The only drawback is not really knowing the distance or parameter limits between city and highway. I seem to get a lot of false starts still in highway mode, but in City mode, I can be very close to a radar source before it goes off. I've been driving around in highway mode ignoring many false signals... which will be a problem when one of them is real :-0

Reviews.Title: The best radar detector for the price
Reviews.Author: ronald butler
Reviews.Content: This radar detector the best investment I've made excellent product. I've had other radar detectors but my opinion I think Kober is the best.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Brian Whitten
Reviews.Content: This is a great product you will love it! It's like an open road on the highway now for me!

Reviews.Title: One of Cobra's best for the money
Reviews.Author: Mitch Hutchinson
Reviews.Content: By far the best detector I have owned.  The last detector I had was a Valentine One.  I did not want to spend that kind of money again, so I researched the Cobra and other lines.  I chose this XRS 9945 simply because for the money it has the best features.  Auto mute and Intellimute are great features.  In addition it gives you the choice of just giving a verbal alert without the annoying loud beeps followed or a combination thereof.  Setting the engine revs means that if you set the Intellimute to a certain level of your RPM's it will be silent until you exceed that setting.  It also gives you a compass feature.  Soon I will buy the upgrade in order to have the remote picture ticket database warning.  You know a flash of light and then you get a ticket in the mail.  This detector has great range.  I've had it go off without seeing the target radar until a couple miles down the road as it gradually increased its alert.  Wonderful system.

Reviews.Title: XRS 9345 is a piece of crap.  Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Lance N.
Reviews.Content: I bought an XRS 9345 for my brother birthday because he had a ticket.  Out of the box and the damn thing keep detecting a "L" during day light BUT not at night.  It's so annoying that my brother give it back to me.  I traded him for my old one that work just perfect.  Anyway a couple day later I got a speeding ticket, DAMN it's been years(my old one would have detected it, save me many time).  Don't buy this model, It'S a piece of #$@$#.  Can't detect, false signal, can't heard what the woman voice saying.  Many more bad stuff but it geting too long here.  JUST don't buy it, it's bad,  I had to Throw my away.

Reviews.Title: Great Value and Works Like a Charm
Reviews.Author: Alan Owens
Reviews.Content: This radar detector works! No false alerts, whenever I get an alert there is a police vehicle nearby. The one exception is there is a radar tower on my my daily commute, and it does alert me when I'm within range. This detector is a great value, and worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: It does what it suppose to do
Reviews.Author: Raiford D.
Reviews.Content: I love it because it does not have a lot of false alerts. The rangeis grate even on the city mode.

Reviews.Title: Didn't detect a parked mobile radar unit
Reviews.Author: Lotto
Reviews.Content: Radar detector would randomly go off with no cop in sight. Drove by a parked mobile radar unit and radar detector didn't sound once.  Same when I drove by 3 cops sitting on the highway. Put my old radar detector (audio quit working) up with this one, old detector went off for the mobile radar unit and the new radar didn't detect it at all.  Returned product for refund

Reviews.Title: Working perfectly
Reviews.Author: Ulugbek Khudoynazarov
Reviews.Content: I have been using my Cobra XRS 9745 for 5 days and it is working good. I did not face any trouble while using.

Reviews.Title: One paranoid detector
Reviews.Author: LCadaver
Reviews.Content: I must say I'm disappointed. This is my third radar detector in nine years. The previous two were also Cobras, though they were more like the XRS9445 model, with the single letter illuminating for each alert, rather than a dynamic OLED screed. I was perfectly happy with both previous detectors; they never failed to detect a threat, and they almost never seemed to give false positives. "If they were so great," I hear you asking, "then why are you on your third one?" Well, the first one was stolen from my car, and the second lasted years before the speaker finally gave out, though the screen and the detection function were still working fine.Anyway, now that the background's out of the way, onto THIS radar detector.It does indeed detect radar signals, as I can tell every time I drive through the construction zone on my way to work. The compass seems to work reasonably well once calibrated.This is without a doubt the most paranoid radar detector I've ever seen. It never seems to be silent, and I get the feeling that the VAST majority of the detections are really nothing at all. I'm used to having a radar detector, and I'm used to getting X alerts when I'm near supermarkets, and I know where all the consistent "false alarm" areas are in my commute. But this thing goes off every five seconds on a different band to the point where it's in serious danger of "Boy who cried 'Wolf'" syndrome.My second complaint is about the screen. Unfortunately, even at maximum brightness with the screen directly in front of me, it can be difficult to make out what's on the screen through the reflections and glare on a sunny day.Overall, given the chance, I'd gladly trade this to have either of my previous (cheaper) Cobra units back.

Reviews.Title: Be aware
Reviews.Author: Pedro Becerra Rueda
Reviews.Content: This radar detects al signal in the city and also some fake alarms but its OK, I just test in the city and I like it.

Reviews.Title: Works greats!
Reviews.Author: Kacee (Hamre) Perez
Reviews.Content: This Cobra radar detector works great. It works just as described online in the description, so glad I got it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Randeau
Reviews.Content: This item was exactly as described and the price was great.  I would definitely recommend it and purchase this item again.

Reviews.Title: Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: Sharon Peterson
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it much yet, but after reading the manual, it seems easy to operate. I did plug it in and the display is bright and easy to read.

Reviews.Title: does what they say will do
Reviews.Author: tom fulton
Reviews.Content: I like it ,paid for itself first hour of use.new lazer gun turned on me on 5 min. Drive to work.

Reviews.Title: Very limited functionality
Reviews.Author: Ahmed S Erakat "kingaukh"
Reviews.Content: I bought this on a whim. Amazon sent me an email highlighting a big sale on radars and this one had great reviews for the price and I bought it. I realize about 1-2 months into having it the radar only can identify vehicle radars if they are in front of your car, and therefore any vehicles with radar behind you or to your side get missed. There were many times as well that a vehicle with radar would be directly in my view but the radar would not go off. Would look for another one with memory of stationary radars.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Mike Anderson
Reviews.Content: Installed with velcro in my wife's car after she received a speeding ticket. It works great so far and if nothing else, is a reminder to check your speed. The auto quiet feature that adjusts the volume level post initial alert is great. So far, this detector has notified us well in advance of any radar activity including emergency scenes and construction zones.If you are using this to speed and get out of a ticket.... good luck and i hope you have great medical,vehicle and life insurance. This is a great device for use as a safety warning to remind us to check our speed and remind us that there are areas up ahead that need special attention to safe driving.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: device works great,but too many fake warnings.cant catch signals on long ranges,try to hold as down as possible on dashboard

Reviews.Title: Not Great
Reviews.Author: texex "'Plane jockey'"
Reviews.Content: Pretty cheap radar detector.  But then again you get what you pay for.  Doesn't seem to pick up much on highway or city--a lot of false alarms.

Reviews.Title: con
Reviews.Author: Smitty
Reviews.Content: My older 12 band worked better had quicker detection and distance not bad for the price as the unit comes complete with everything you need to install and use.

Reviews.Title: Good unit
Reviews.Author: Hawgfan "Hawgfan"
Reviews.Content: This replaces an older Cobra that was more expensive.  I like this one fine.  I am not heavy on the gas pedal and rarely use the unit but it works good when I have it on.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this.
Reviews.Author: toby
Reviews.Content: The sensitivity of this is horrible. The radar has to be almost on top of you for this thing to alarm. Got a ticket the second day I had this thing.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9845 - Awesome
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: My former radar detector bit the dust .... it was a 'gift' from a friend and it served me well. I had gone in to Car Toys locally and they advised I spent $179. on one of their detectors and since I am a student, I really don't have that kind of money to 'drop' on something that is a luxury more than a necessity ... so I went online and found this one, which has massive features above what was offered to me at Car Toys.... so I purchased it.It is way easy to set up.... and it works wonderfully... I would highly recommend this to anyone in need of something cost-effective and functional w/ out a mass amount of techie ability.....

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: M. Patel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this radar detector due to the reviews.  I have used it on major highways and it does not go off all the time.  It seems to have worked on several occasions.

Reviews.Title: Works great, few false alarms, cheaper then even 1 speeding ticket.
Reviews.Author: Legit Camper
Reviews.Content: This radar is amazing. It works very well with pop laser and I have been using it for over 2 months without any issues. Every time it has warned me. In Orange county Florida you can ignore almost all X or K alerts but watch out for any KA and stalker liedar. You will get false alerts but that can be minimized with inteli-mute. You set what RPM the radar stops beeping at. It works really well for big intersections with big box stores and my least favorite Walgreen's (seems to be one at every intersection) If this is your first radar you're buying this one is a must have. Don't mount it like it says in the instructions.My recommendation is a low mount with the radar facing slightly downward pointing in-front of the car. I have never seen a cop shoot a laser at the back of a car so I don't see the reason for making sure the rear eye can "see" through the back window.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: hannieboo2
Reviews.Content: It was a little pricey, hasn't gotten me out of a ticket. In fact I did get one but that is when it wasn't plugged in, so who knows if would have detected the speed camera... It did beep a few times for no apparent reason.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS9945 Voice Alert 15 Band Radar/Laser Detector
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: I really like this detecter.  When you add the GPS piece (which can be updated), it's sweet.  It will let you know when you are in photo enforcement areas, alerts you to different band cycles, and rarely do I get a false reading (only around banks, I get a bleep).

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: edu
Reviews.Content: High quality. I highly recommend it!! It is as good as announced. If i need another one, I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent device
Reviews.Author: T. Kanan
Reviews.Content: I really like it. I've been using it for four months, it saved me a lot. It is really worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Lot of false alarms
Reviews.Author: Jackson Long
Reviews.Content: Regardless of if I'm in city of highway mode I tend to get a ton of false alerts. This is due to the town I stay in but I thought the city mode helped to eliminate this problem. The only regret I have for this purchase, aside from waiting soooo long to buy it, is that I didn't spend the little extra to get the upgraded model with voice alerts. My buddy has the one with GPS but he's not very happy with the GPS on it as it's too unspecific. He just uses his phone. However his notes when it has recurring false alerts and uses the GPS to remember them, thereby ignoring them after so many times. For the use they were both purchased for, they both do great. Mine has helped me to avoid at least 3-4 speeding tickets in the short time I've had it, maybe a month now. If you have a lead foot and don't need GPS, buy it the price is right and it functions perfectly aside from the false alerts that is lol!

Reviews.Title: cobra XRS 9945 very good
Reviews.Author: adnan
Reviews.Content: Cobra XRS 9945 Voice Alert 15-Band Radar/Laser Detector with Full-Color...dear sellerbefore, but now it's not that I want to buy this product nowI'd appreciate if you can help

Reviews.Title: Radar, ok. Laser, not good!
Reviews.Author: James Sheehan
Reviews.Content: Worked really well for radar. Picked up very early. Not so good on LIDAR (Laser). Got nailed first time out. Perhaps there is no defense for LIDAR. We'll have to wait and see.

Reviews.Title: Really great
Reviews.Author: MattCum4111
Reviews.Content: The detector is really strong an works all the time. It has really easy instructions and has alot of great features! I think I would have bought the hardware kit that comes with it so you don't have to use a spot in your cig lighter. But the item itself is great and has not given me any problems an this is using it for almost two moths now

Reviews.Title: windshield mount isn't good
Reviews.Author: Mendy D.
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy about this radar detector. Although it goes off plenty of time for nothing. But I have it just for a few months and the mount keeps on falling off my windshield. Please send me a new mount!!

Reviews.Title: Cobra Strikes Again
Reviews.Author: Jorge Ribeiro
Reviews.Content: Another awesome product from Cobra. We love all the new features the XRS 9945 has that our 10 year old Cobra didn't have.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Vladimir UK
Reviews.Content: I got this one thinking its perfect for a low budget Radar. It was not bad for range but it was missing some radar bands. I went past cops on 4 different occasions where you can see then pointing the radar gun but the thing did not even beep. So then I bought a Beltronic 940 Ill see how it does.

Reviews.Title: Didn't read any radars.
Reviews.Author: Adam Retallick
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this product to anyone.  It did not read a single radar even when I went by two cops who were obviously checking speeds.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Ginamann "mickeymoto"
Reviews.Content: The 2 things I dislike is the mount system, It will be fine until it wears out & the volume is to low. I have yet to own a dettector that has a good volume. This one works great for what I paid for it (using Amazon points I payed $37.00) & in my mind it gives me a better atvantage than if I didn't have one.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy It
Reviews.Author: Write_mark
Reviews.Content: I'll get right to the point.  This unit falses often and actually will go off non-stop after a while.  Must be defective and I'll deal with that but the main problem is the audio alert is way too low.  I had an older model and loved it but decided to upgrade when I purchased a new car.  Based on the volume alone I have gone back to the old model.  If you can't hear the alert it is of no value.

Reviews.Title: Works pretty good, tested the range & works quite far.
Reviews.Author: igor
Reviews.Content: Sometimes gives out false codes, but you know all those wave signals roaming around in this tech world now-a-days... It works great for me :)

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Kyle S
Reviews.Content: Worked great for the first two weeks and now its like it isn't picking up any radar. I have passed a lot of cop in the past few days and it hasn't went off. I don't know if the cops jut don't have their radar running or what but it has picked up a lot of radar the past few weeks. Guess we will see what happens! Pretty good item for the money.

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Hiwaycruiser
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a older, proven Cobra that would not pickup pop radar and some of the newer bands. I do a lot of highway driving and consistently will drive 10-15 miles over the limit.  Very disappointed. Falses way to often. Even in city mode, this thing barks more than a Iditarod dog team at dinner time.  Range is very inconsistent compared to my older Cobra. I even put them side by side and went out looking for radar traps. The older Cobra was quicker. As far as Pop radar detection, I think the only Pop its dialed into is the soda machines at the 7-11's I drive by. The emergency vehicle alert feature is nice but the ambulance/fire truck is well within sight before it goes off. With a 10 over ticket costing me over $150 (Pop detection did not work), I am going to ante up for something more refined. I know radar detectors are not 100% but compared to my older Cobra, this one is pretty poor.

Reviews.Title: Works Like it should
Reviews.Author: Steve-o
Reviews.Content: Nothing special about it. It does what it is supposed to do and i'm very happy with this product. For the price i paid for this. You can't beat all the features.

Reviews.Title: So far so good....
Reviews.Author: clint e.
Reviews.Content: ...no tickets yet at least.  This detector seems to behave like others I have had in the past - giving occasional false-alarms when passing shopping centers or in neighborhoods that may be using a microwave, but I can tell them from the real thing usually.  It has given me a few strong alarms at times, but I did not see any police cars so either it was picking up a long range signal or they were hidden.  I agree with others who claim that the window mount is flimsy.  It is made of thin metal, and the unit vibrates quite a bit when driving.  It also gets very warm after a couple of hours use, but I think that is probably normal for detectors.  Seems nice for the price!

Reviews.Title: Works well at long distances
Reviews.Author: Martysh
Reviews.Content: Only issue I have is the display when it switches to dark.  To know that it is still on there is a tiny (perhaps 1 pixel) dot that shows up on the screen.  Oftentimes, it is impossible to see this dot in the daytime.  I suggest that Cobra come up with some other way to go dark yet signify that the device is still working, like a very dim screen not just a single dot.Otherwise, I would recommend this based on features and price.

Reviews.Title: Just slow down...
Reviews.Author: Robert B. Hailey "haileymon"
Reviews.Content: ...or spend the big bucks on a Valentine. I have driven thousands of miles with this thing on and it only goes off for supermarket doors. My wife recently got a ticket in Indiana while using it. The cop just snickered at it.

Reviews.Title: saved my butt
Reviews.Author: ricknjill
Reviews.Content: Work in Jersey, usually don't get out of work til late.Every little town between the office and the bridges set up speed traps at different spots from one night to the next.I can get a bit heavy on the peddle with wide open roads.The alerts have brought me out of my trance enough times that it's paid for itself.

Reviews.Title: very good frontal coverage
Reviews.Author: carter mounet
Reviews.Content: Frontal coverage is great. Rear coverage not the greatest. Although I do have tinted windows.  Has clear line to back. Has saved me from one ticket already. Have to keep instruction booklet in car. There are a lot of features. Worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Works great plenty of warning
Reviews.Author: David Baumgartner
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with this I need plenty of warning when  I drive and it was really beneficial when we went on vacation.

Reviews.Title: It's fine.
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Hruza
Reviews.Content: This worked really well for the first few months, but all of the lights quickly burned out. None of them light up anymore. I still use it because the sounds go off. It's good for the price, but not very long-lasting.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9945.
Reviews.Author: Sam LEE
Reviews.Content: This is my second XRS 9945 i order from  Amazon,it's work and safe me from speeding fine,and safe my licence.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: cervezagut
Reviews.Content: Unit works very well for my needs.  Not too many "false" alerts.  Usually have enough warning to check my speed & slow down if necessary - particularly in school zones.....

Reviews.Title: Saves me tickets regularly
Reviews.Author: Xrunner2012
Reviews.Content: Radar detector works great. It saves me on a regular basis because I drive an hour back and forth to work and the road is notorious for speed traps. It gives me fare warning before I see fuzz and that's what counts.

Reviews.Title: Not for in-city use....
Reviews.Author: Paul Meriwether
Reviews.Content: The Specter and Pop alert go off constantly even in city mode.However, while traveling the interstate, or some other major highway, gives alerts in PLENTY of time.

Reviews.Title: It sort of works
Reviews.Author: tsering kartsang
Reviews.Content: Pro: UmmmmmCon: It beeps on lots of other thing but COPS. When it does beep for Cops, they are about 20 feet away from you which gives no time for you to react. I guess my eye sight is WAY better than this Cobra. Oh and it also heats up like crazy after having it on for more than 30 minutes.

Reviews.Title: saved me on the first road trip
Reviews.Author: Julius
Reviews.Content: This Cobra paid for itself on the first and second road trip I took with it. Well worth the dollars I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: great radar detector!
Reviews.Author: ladycove
Reviews.Content: My husband loves his new radar detector...we have had cobra detectors for the past 30 years...they are reliable and very affordable..when my husband is going to be driving a long distance he relies on the radar detector to keep him ticket free!

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Adam E. Mis
Reviews.Content: It goes off while I am in vision of radar gun. It works but distance is not great and many false alarms you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: jonathan hernandez
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good radar detector. It comes with its own windshield mounter and two sided 3M velcro tape for dash mounting. The bottom half of the 3M tape stopped sticking but thats probably because of the heat inside the car. I like the ability to switch from city and highway mode and that it remembers which mode you were in everytime you turn it off. The only problem i have with it is the distance detector. It's supposed to start at 1 when the detector first goes off and goes up to 5 as the signal gets stronger but the most its ever went up to is 2, even as the cop went by. Of course its not gonna be very effective if your doin Fast and Furious through the streets but if youre only going 5-15 above the limit, you should be good. IF you are planning on doing serious speeding, you should buy one of the $200 radar detectors.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Great radar for a great price! I highly recommend this to anyone. I bought it as a gift and the recipient couldn't have been happier!

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Banks
Reviews.Content: It' saving me a lot of money great radar detector for the money thanks again. will tell others about this

Reviews.Title: Do what it's supposed to do ...
Reviews.Author: Daniel J de Beer
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy. Detector does what it is supposed to do - keep me aware of any radar or laser signals where I'm driving. It is a lot more sensitive than my previous detector which died on me.

Reviews.Title: Too many false alarm
Reviews.Author: Eric M. Romain
Reviews.Content: Beeps constantly for absolutely no reason making it non trustworthy. Exact same problem I experience on my previous Cobra detector.

Reviews.Title: i would reccond
Reviews.Author: chris mitchell
Reviews.Content: it is very sensitive on highway mode I don"t like the lazer mode when you accelerate at high rpms the lazor activates besides this, an excellent detector

Reviews.Title: it works  ok
Reviews.Author: alberto fuentes
Reviews.Content: it should be louder .... if u have a sound system i dont recommend this because its not loud enoughworks okay but much rather stick with escort redline or valentine  or even better get the 50 dollar cheapest one they all do the same

Reviews.Title: Best bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: austen hessinger
Reviews.Content: I love this thing. Not only was it cheap(129) but it feels and acts like a much more expensive radar detector. This doesn't really pick up false signals, but definitely picks up the cops. On my daily drive to work, I encounter speed traps all the time, and this gets every single one of them. It picks up laser form the state troopers just fine, as well as the other well known ka band. Not really many cops use k band or even x band, so you'll know its a cop when it starts going off. Word of warning though, it does pick up other radar detectors, and will say its a spectre alert. But don't worry! its nothing to worry about, and it's kind of funny watching the other driver freaking out and slowing down thinking a cop caught them. The range on this is very nice! A couple times it picked up a ka band from over a mile away on a straight, and on highway driving expect to slow down almost immediately after you hear the noise, because after they lock onto you, they already have your speed. So on the highway, try  to stay behind atleast one person who is speeding too, because the radar will go onto them, and your detector will pick that up, and give you more time to slow down before the cops suspect you're speeding. Overall, this was the best money could buy on a budget. In my opinion, it's as good as one of those 500 dollar escorts! Definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Corba good product
Reviews.Author: Elsa
Reviews.Content: This unit works very well and the price is right. Very few false alarms in city use. Saves me ticket & insurance $$$$$

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9345
Reviews.Author: Billie Koehler
Reviews.Content: I have nothing but good things to say about this unit. It has saved me getting a ticket more than a few times-and that's the exact reason I purchased this unit. It's easy to use and install takes about 2 mins. Plus the price was good to for this radar detector. If you are looking for a great unit at a good price- that provides great results,this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Cobra 9545 Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: Ronald D. Ivy
Reviews.Content: I have had a lot of radar detectors but this one has to be one of the best of all of them.  I would truly recommend this detector.  For the money,  it is the best.  Go get it now before they are gone.

Reviews.Title: saved me a few times
Reviews.Author: Loren Fihn
Reviews.Content: Just took a road trip to Denver and back and it worked better than expected and VERY FEW false alerts.  Saved me some speeding tickets.

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: randy w willingham
Reviews.Content: good detector if you are on the road like i am all the time helps with small town speed traps but doesn't work well with pop radar

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Gregory N. Pyck
Reviews.Content: Does it all, great product for the price. Very easy to use. Makes you very aware of your surroundings. Nice design.

Reviews.Title: Decent price
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: The charger cord fell apart as we took it out of the box to plug it in. But everything else works well.

Reviews.Title: Awesome detector
Reviews.Author: J. Lombardo
Reviews.Content: I traveled recently to Florida and I had just purchased this radar detector prior to my trip. Well it doesn't just detect all radar, it also makes a low sounding alert for false alarms. It starts off with an initially loud alarm but goes into a low mode after that. Much improved over the old ones that would beep all the time even in city mode. It saved me big time in Georgia when a Police officer was sitting on the median and the detector picked up the radar signal way in advance. It's a great buy for the price over those expensive tickets!

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: PAWEL JUSMAN
Reviews.Content: Overall I'm satisfied with the purchase. Easy to install and understand the messages. I prefer to drive on the highway mode because it's more sensitive than a city mode.

Reviews.Title: Good detector..
Reviews.Author: Archie Carouthers
Reviews.Content: Old cobra detector for some reason stopped picking up signals particularly Ka bands. This one saved me from getting a ticket by a State Trooper hiding in a fog bank on the side of the road....

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: This radar i bought was alot different than my last one. it seems to work alot better than my old one. it seems to do the job and keep me out of trouble

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Tai P.
Reviews.Content: This is a great investment! It has prevented me from getting into sticky and expensive situations. It rarely has any false detection and this radar does a great job warning me of POP radars, X bands, KA bands, and lasers! The 360 degree detection really works while attached to my windshield. I do not have tints, so I am getting great detection from a safe distance. It actually does work with over the hill detection's as well. Definitely a good investment!

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9945
Reviews.Author: rob
Reviews.Content: Received the Cobra XRS 9945 , it worked great for a while.All functions operated as expected.Later on (2 years or less),  the voice output became intermittent, and the switches on top of the detector appeared to be stuck.I have had this problem with other Cobra Detectors from earlier years.I had hoped Cobra had had enough similar audio output issues and had improved the quality of the on/off switch and audio amplifier.I am guessing it comes from intolerance to the excessive heat in the cars.I do not recommend Cobra Detectors with Voice to anyone.Thank you Amazon for providing a good price and delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great radar
Reviews.Author: Karen Caro
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself, but I wasn't sure if it would work as well as the more expensive ones.  I can say that it is just a good as the more expensive radars out there and has already paid for itself.

Reviews.Title: Good detection
Reviews.Author: kevlarklh
Reviews.Content: Performs better than the Early Warning radar detector that I was using.  Picks up all kinds of the latest lasers.

Reviews.Title: great one to have and I like it so much and it works so good and perfectly. Enjoy all of you
Reviews.Author: Saleem A. Al Tassan
Reviews.Content: great one to have and I like it so much and it works so good and perfectly. Enjoy all of you

Reviews.Title: I have had many radar detectors, by far this is the best for the money!! hands down :)
Reviews.Author: Brian Godwin
Reviews.Content: I was shocked how amazing this detector is !! goes off way ahead of time at first i thought something was wrong until 3 to 5 mins later a cop car either is coming toward me or behind me!! works great and definently a detector you can trust!! would buy again, Best online price !! This detector is normally found for $170 , You buy it you will love it !!

Reviews.Title: already saved me from a ticket
Reviews.Author: TERESA
Reviews.Content: the signals and voice alerts allowed me to be aware of speed traps nearby when I was on the phone

Reviews.Title: great and depenable
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Boleslawski
Reviews.Content: love this one. less false readings then my 12 band cobra that this replaced. well worth the money and i would buy another one for my other car.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: PorterB
Reviews.Content: We are always using it. It has saved us from a few tickets. My only issue is that even on city it still picks up automatic doors

Reviews.Title: excellent acquisition
Reviews.Author: Arturo Gonzalez Zuniga
Reviews.Content: great equipment, it is really an investment. I got dash base, but it was not necessary I put this on windshield, best option would be to get a second base for windshield for a second car.

Reviews.Title: Cobra Radar Dectector
Reviews.Author: D. Hilliard
Reviews.Content: After purchasing another leading brand of radar and sending it back, I came back to the Cobra that my husband had previouly.It has the features he likes and it has already saved him more than the cost of the unit.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Bob_S
Reviews.Content: Lots of different radar bands are detectedSuction cups could be better as they were difficult to attach to the windshield

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Khaled Al-Kuwaikbi
Reviews.Content: The alarm goes on everytime I pass by an ATM a GSM transmitter/tower (BST), almost any security camera launches the alarm. I am still finding it dificult to adjust the settings. other than that it is a good product.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit and wok well
Reviews.Author: Kay R. Pulver "Pulverizer"
Reviews.Content: I dislike speed traps and this unit has saved my butt several times. For the cost of this unit it is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Nice features
Reviews.Author: A. DOBRSKI
Reviews.Content: Seems really accurate and has a mute setting to keep from the annoying sound after first being alerted.  I have only used it for 2 months, but haven't noticed Police when it didn't go off.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9945 Voice Alert Radar Detector.
Reviews.Author: David P. Fleurant "e6chromes"
Reviews.Content: A good product. It preforms as advertised. Suction cup mounting system is anemic so I opted for a sticky rubber pad on the dash instead. Sticky pad retains the detector well and also makes removal very easy. I have had several detectors over the years and prefer this mounting approach .

Reviews.Title: Great and ticket free!
Reviews.Author: P A "Walking is man's best medicine. Hippocrates"
Reviews.Content: Great works great all the time i always buy the Cobra's. Since at least 2000 so think using them for 13 years and never got a ticket.

Reviews.Title: System okay but requires additional add on
Reviews.Author: CATO
Reviews.Content: System functions adequately, however had to buy additional add on for red light cameras unlike my beltronics and the screen is way too small

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Does what is says its gonna do.. and detects radars on the other road and around corners ...away from my line of driving..simply perfect. Money well spent.

Reviews.Title: radar detecter
Reviews.Author: Brenda Laird
Reviews.Content: I like the radar detector but...... It didn't keep me from getting a ticket not sure on the distance but as soon as it did go off i was already caught

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: dutch4892
Reviews.Content: Seems to be fairly sensitive, but imo not as great as an x50 although it's close.  Reason I bought this one is that my old silver x50 busted and I was looking for something newer/cheaper.  Overall I am happy with this one, can't really buy a better detector for the price.  I have been on several road trips over the last few months and this detector has saved me quite a few tickets.  Only real issue with it was that the provided suction cups didn't work at all.  Needed to grab some new ones from the drawer to keep it on the windshield.  Not sure if they were just old or what???

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: Got this for xmas.  Can't believe I have lived 49 years without one.  This thing works great.  Yes you get some false alarms, but it is super easy to tell them, it beeps only once.  So when you drive by a Walgreens, yes it beeps once, big deal.  It spots radar and laser long before you see the cop.  This is a RADAR/LASER detector NOT a cop detector.  I have driven by cops and the unit did not go off. Why? Because they were not looking for speeders and did not have their radar or laser on.  It works great.  I can't drive without it now.  The only downside is the suction cups suck and the power cord is way to short.  I have to stretch it out to work, otherwise it pulls the unit off the dash.  I got a $5 sticky pad, the kind to put your cellphone on, and velcroed the unit to the sticky pad.  The sticky pad sticks to the dash without leaving any marks and I can transfer the unit between cars quickly.  I am going to buy a longer cord and then I will give it a 100% rating.Also if any emergency vehicles are heading your way, the thing goes off like a christmas tree, very nice.Note to Cobra: lengthen the cord by another foot!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Lisa L. Price
Reviews.Content: This radar detector seems to do just as good a job as the one that we bought that cost over $300. Highly recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: averagebuyer
Reviews.Content: This unit was very helpful, you can turn off options such as spectre v or whatever you dont need. I live in california and dont need the radar detector detector. I have had other cobra products and this one has warned me in enough time to adjust speed. Visible and fairly loud if need be.Will buy more if needed

Reviews.Title: RADAR COBRA XRS 9945
Reviews.Author: Sir_Reads_A_Lot
Reviews.Content: very good excellent radar I had an escort before and cobra  xrs 9945 for me works better I love it

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Samantha Poris
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my boyfriend. He loves it and uses it everywhere!!! Beeps a lot, but when you understand the meanings behind the beeps it is ok!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: tijey
Reviews.Content: I wish the intellimute worked better. It has a hard time recognizing my car's Revs.Doesn't catch all the radars so you still need to watch out for Patrol cars...

Reviews.Title: Yes, it is OK!
Reviews.Author: Cornell Drentea "Cornell"
Reviews.Content: Limited use in a big city where any RF source is interpreted as a K or Ka alert! Lots of false alarms! Very useful on highways!

Reviews.Title: Cobra Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: Maury A. Kroopnick "Newfie"
Reviews.Content: The radar detector was easily installed. It alerts you quickly. The suction cups were difficult to set on the window but finally set and hold well. The price was less than on other sights.

Reviews.Title: Buena compra
Reviews.Author: GUILLERMO RUEDA
Reviews.Content: Estoy muy satisfecho con el producto, de buena calidad y me llego muy rapido, esta a un precio comodo y de buena calidad.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: William Arnett
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. I would recommend this product. You need to be prepared. This also makes you a more alert driver and is a constant reminder to monitor your driving habits.

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: Ryan B "Byrd"
Reviews.Content: I've had this Cobra for 9 months now and I feel like I know the product pretty well.For $60 you can't really complain.  It's not a Valentine One but it gets the job done for me.  It really only gives you a quarter of a mile to a half mile warning.  If you hear it beeping at K1 or KA1 their could be police radaring you from behind.  I've never had a signal stronger than 1 from behind.This radar does like to beep between K1 and K2 at door openers (frequently CVS).Once you learn how to read the signals and what the possibilities of each one are (depending on strength and type) it's a solid radar to have! Very happy with purchase.  It's saved me about 3-4 times.Update 4/25/13:  I turned off the POP mode as it goes off quite frequently and I never see any police.  I highly recommend disabling X frequencies by putting reading the manual.  It's very easy to do so.This thing has saved me 4 times in the last 2 months so I'm updating to say this thing is AWESOME. All 4 times I was going about 40 in a 30 mph zone with a 20 mph school zone approaching.  Each time I was unable to contain my excitement, I was yelling "OH YEAH!!" after passing the cops because they were unable to get me speeding.  I have gotten readings on the highway but I wasn't speeding as traffic slowed down enough to warn me there was something up ahead.One feature I've come to love is the mute button.  In the second setting (pressing the mute button while no radar is being detected) it will cut the radar volume in half after 5 beeps.  This is great when I have people in the car and they don't want to hear this thing beep.  When I'm by myself I put it on the first setting so it beeps at a constant volume.Overall, on a budget this thing rocks.  Gives you a heads up (not a terribly long one but definitely good enough) as to slow down.  Would buy it again, unless I get the money for a V1.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely the smartest purchase for me
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this radar detector.  It was cheap, it has been super reliable, and it has saved me from numerous tickets.  Seller shipped super fast as well.  I live in the Washington DC area and I haven't had any false readings.

Reviews.Title: Good but not reliable
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: It only beeps when cops have their radar on and there has been times when it just beeps late. Its a good product but not reliable.

Reviews.Title: Good quality but with some false alarms
Reviews.Author: Chris Mostert
Reviews.Content: The Cobra performs well and I am in general happy with it.I have found that driving in built-up areas often cause false alarms and hardly use it there. On open roads it is a lot better, although I have notice that if you approach a GSM cellphone mast head-on, it also triggers a false alarm.The two cup window suction bracket is rather flimsy but at least the unit has not fallen of so far. Charger cable too short.

Reviews.Title: cousin loved it
Reviews.Author: f250truckdriver
Reviews.Content: He says  it's already saved him a couple tickets.  Had to play around with the setting to get it working.  Definitely not a plug and play.  Spend the time setting it up.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Basir
Reviews.Content: This is the best thing I ever did for myself this radar has already saved me from getting a ticket several times,only downside is the the alert goes off when passing around buildings with automatic doors

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Some false positives, the AM 580 KMJ towers set mine off for POP sometimes. but really, filtering out only police radars is pretty much impossible because so many other things use those frequencies as well. door openers, etc. works decent though. saved my butt a few times.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: India0728
Reviews.Content: Gift for X-mas given to my son and it seems to work. Not really sure if it will avoid future tickets or anything but we can hope!

Reviews.Title: What were they thinking?
Reviews.Author: Richio
Reviews.Content: I received this product as a gift from my wife for Christmas. I have an older Cobra unit I have owned for about 10 years that still works but has finally started to fall apart. The detector looks nice but doesn't work as well as my older unit. I can't adjust the detector to the correct sensitivity setting. It either goes off constantly or not at all. On a side by side comparison the older unit always detects a signal first when both detect a signal.My biggest complaint with this detector is the power cord. It is way too short! What were the designers thinking? The relaxed cord is less than 18" long. When stretched to reach the windshield of my very small Chevy Aveo the tension on the cord rips the suction cups off the glass. Very disappointed with this product from a long time Cobra fan.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Carl
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly and has for over a year now, absolutely love it.I've used it in a 2010 Nissan Altima, 2011 Honda Accord, 2005 Jeep Wrangler, and a heavily modified 1991 Mercury Capri without issue.Never been pulled over while using this device. Would buy again.It alerts me of motion detecting doors used in stores.
