Some may find this annoying after a while, but you can change the settings not to go off for that particular frequency (frequency X)

Reviews.Title: Very usefull
Reviews.Author: XwoLf
Reviews.Content: Very usefull. It has detected signals a couple of times that has saved me from getting a ticket. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Detector
Reviews.Author: Y. Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I love, love, love this detector.  The price was right and it is very effective.  Works everytime.  What is amazing about this is that it detects radar going downhill, around corners, and trees.  It has even detected radar up to a mile.  You will definitely love this detector!

Reviews.Title: Complete and utter failure - Dead Upon Arrival
Reviews.Author: 6String
Reviews.Content: I ordered this unit because of it's great reviews.  Upon receipt, I plugged it into my car, only to have it emit a burning smell and never fire up.  I think I received a refurbished unit and not a new one.Then, today, as I initiated a return, I was informed that the item not in stock for a replacement. Not only that, the price is $20 higher now.  (the product page does not state it is out of stock only further letting me know that I probably received a refurb from the beginning.)For the first time, I feel somewhat ripped off by Amazon.  If I were you, I might go elsewhere for this item.

Reviews.Title: A good detector
Reviews.Author: Old Man Walking
Reviews.Content: It takes a learning curve to get use to this detector, but once I got a handle on what it was telling me, I really appreciate it.  The thing I really get a kick out of is when the unit starts up.  This very nice female voice comes on and says, "Testing."  Then the screen runs through all the alerts you have selected and the voice says, "System ready!"  What a great way to start up your vehicle!

Reviews.Title: Only worked 30% of the time.
Reviews.Author: King David
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews i expected to get a good detector but as of now it is a hit and miss detector.  Good thing i'm not a speed demon cause if that was the case i already would of gotten 3 tickets just this past weekend.

Reviews.Title: It worked for me.
Reviews.Author: G. Dixon
Reviews.Content: I had to make an impromptu trip from OC California to Ohio and back. I had to decide whether to drive my older BMW or newer Toyota Avalon. I choose the BMW. Once I made that decision I realized I would need my radar detector.  I searched for two days for my old detector, but could not find it anywhere.  I read the reviews and decided on this particular Cobra.I had my car serviced and I immediately hit the road.  The directions are informative, but a bit confusing. I set the detector up, and it alerted me numerous times in advance to slow down. The alerting beeps were easily heard and distinguished from the constant music being played.  There were the expected false alert that could have meant the officer was cleverly hidden. I would have to occasionally slow down for a few miles and I am sure that saved me from a crafty officer.I was on the highway just before Christmas and it was alarming to see so many people getting tickets. If you are driving reckless of course you need to be stopped, while exceeding the speed limit a bit to get to family or friends is questionable.A lot of families holiday were ruined because of a speeding ticket. Fortunately that Cobra kept me from being one of them. The weather was so treacherous on the way back that I tip-toe home. I thought I was behaving and that Cobra still saved me a few times. I am not from Ohio, but I have numerous family members there.  I will probably return this upcoming summer, and I will probably rely on that Cobra radar detector.

Reviews.Title: very good radar
Reviews.Author: helibob
Reviews.Content: At first i dint know how it work and got a speeding ticket but after that very good is working properly toy expectations..

Reviews.Title: Part of it doesn't work!
Reviews.Author: Robert Richards
Reviews.Content: The compass system doesn't work, but all fazes of the detector seem to function okay. I won't buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Unsure
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: I have had this radar for about a month now. I still can't figure out if it works! I have passed over a hundred cops and it went off once. Either none of those cops had their radar guns on or this thing just doesn't work! My last radar (which was a gift, I forget the brand) was stolen. That one worked like a charm and would warn me all the time with enough warning to slow down. It doesn't seem like this radar is doing the same, but we will see.

Reviews.Title: vesg rom Panama
Reviews.Author: Virgilio Simons
Reviews.Content: i bought to replace a 9 band cobra radar detector, i like itI don't have any objection for this model

Reviews.Title: great radar detector for the money
Reviews.Author: B. Tanner "kalikidtx"
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift.  I've have a Valentine One in the past but didn't want anything as expensive this time.  This unit has seriously saved me from numerous tickets and I have only had it six months.  Once you go through the setting and get everything adjusted (most of the different bands were turned off) then it worked great!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Javier Astudillo
Reviews.Content: Its ok same like show . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .thanxs

Reviews.Title: Cobra decent radar detector
Reviews.Author: Randy Dickerson
Reviews.Content: decent warning , mounts very nice on windshield .  Laser protection is worthless, but no laser protection works ..I would recomend for the price

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: M. Manchester "~1~ !~ MLM"
Reviews.Content: False alarms often but its got enough of a range system that you know quickly if its a joke or the real deal. Tells the type of radar and the level of strength its coming in, so you can tell if its focused on you or a type that is only used by police. Worth the money, Good functionality.

Reviews.Title: Sweet
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, and mount. Easy to read and adjustable volume and brightness. Hope it is will save me from tickets.

Reviews.Title: Saved me $$ already!
Reviews.Author: KayDee23
Reviews.Content: This baby has already gotten me out of three tickets just in the last month or so. Could not be more happy with it. Works very well, don't have any complaints. Cobra is a good brand. They make another one that is a little more expensive than this one that talks to you that I may get a little later. The beeping can get on your nerves, but I would take it over a ticket!!

Reviews.Title: Hoped for better
Reviews.Author: Freeradical
Reviews.Content: Am going to keep but not much better than my 4 yr old uniden unit. But will keep. Not sensitive enough especially laser almost useless and detects most instant on to late

Reviews.Title: Very Easy To Use
Reviews.Author: LT
Reviews.Content: Simple plug and play.  Very detailed instruction book, but once I was done reading it, I decided to stick with the factory defaults that are already programmed in.If you do go with the defaults, you should know that the function which defeats the radar detector detectors that some states use is not a default setting.  You will have to turn that function on using the instruction book.I have since been alerted to every kind of radar used by every police force between my house and where I work, and none of them are using POP.  It does not take long to learn to recognize what is being detected and who it is.You quickly learn which police force uses which radar, and which alerts are not police radar.  Generic alerts like "X1" and "K1" are usually from something like a store's infrared doors or a security system.  You quickly learn where those are.  Police radars give more specific alerts like "Ka1".  And the closer you are to the radar, the faster the detector beeps.I have had some alerts at traffic intersections which have those detectors for emergency vehicles, or maybe they are cameras which take your photo if you go through a red light.  I don't know.Emergency vehicles also alert the detector since many of them now emit a signal to change traffic lights for them.Very, very easy to operate and learn to use.Two annoyances:1. The suction cups on the windshield mount are useless.  They are incredibly stiff and do not adhere at all.  You will either have to use the Velcro mount on your dashboard or find some other way to mount it to your windshield.2. The power cord is really short.  Because I could not use the windshield mount (see above), I had to use the Velco mount and the power cord has to be really stretched to reach up to where the dash is flat enough to point the detector in a straight and level shot out of the windshield.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: This is a really good product. It has saved me from the MANY tickets I am sure I would have received with out it.

Reviews.Title: Cop catcher!
Reviews.Author: DeeLish
Reviews.Content: I bought this detector based on user reviews and Im glad I did! I took a three day road trip from Oregon to Texas and this delievered, few false alarms with plenty of accuarcy for police. The package came in on time and was well prepared. I would highly reccomend this product!

Reviews.Title: Great Radar Detector but...
Reviews.Author: Teresa
Reviews.Content: I have had the XRS 9545 for 2 years saved me at least 100 times. Now 3 days ago it started to sound funny and now the sound is out all together. I have to say this is a very good detector. For me in town it would detect the police long before I would even see him.

Reviews.Title: no trouble.
Reviews.Author: Stanley Drew
Reviews.Content: Keeps me out of trouble. Payed for itself first day. It's worth the money. Has a bunch of nice fetures.

Reviews.Title: it works but gets some false positives.
Reviews.Author: Steve Miller
Reviews.Content: I guess it's better to get some false positives rather than get busted. I did pass a State Trooper and the detector didn't go off. He may not have had his radar on because I didn't get a ticket.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Tomcat
Reviews.Content: The Cobra Radar Detector does all that was advertised.  Clear, concise, and seems to pick up radar with enough time to react.

Reviews.Title: Cobra Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: ronnie bradford
Reviews.Content: I ordered my Cobra radar detector from Amazon almost a year ago. It was a great investment. I am very satisfied with what i got for the money! Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: keeps the tickets down
Reviews.Author: value buyer
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my speed racer of a husband and so far so good. No tickets! :) He loves it and we save money.

Reviews.Title: Kind of a let down
Reviews.Author: coty1218
Reviews.Content: Was excited to find this one at the price I paid.  I missed a couple previous deals that were lower in price.  When I saw this deal, I jumped on it immediately.  Shipping was fairly fast as I recall and packaged well to protect it during shipment.  I could not wait to use it.  From the start it seemed super sensitive which was encouraging compared to my old detector that this one was replacing.  I have had many occasions where the thing would go off but I could not find any troopers or county mounties anywhere.  I have also had instances where the cops were right behind me sneaking up through traffic and the detector did not go off until they were on my bumper.  Very strange !  Not sure that I have the greatest confidence in the unit and kind of disappointing, considering my patience trying to find the best deal and finally nabbing one of these units.  I am being kind at giving it 3 stars.  Maybe a 2.5 is more realistic.

Reviews.Title: Pleased!
Reviews.Author: LDH
Reviews.Content: Very pleased! Second Cobra I've owned, and I've loved both. Already paid for itself by keeping me out of getting stopped!

Reviews.Title: Best quality for the money
Reviews.Author: asperf21
Reviews.Content: This has saved me for several encounters with law enforcement and also alerted me when emergency vehicles were approaching! It has 360 detection and picks up on all cops that have their radar on. The city mode is nice along with automatic mute that turns the beep down all the way. This way, its not constantly beeping and you dont miss the warnings that actually count.

Reviews.Title: Really, a nice detector
Reviews.Author: Araxiel
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these to repalce aging Cobras (at least 10 years old). These are much more sensitive than the old ones. I've been using them for about a week and have no problems. They seem to be sturdily built, and once you get accustomed to the various sounds and visual information displays, they more than prove their worth.  I've used Cobra products for a long time, going back to the days of CB radios, and have found that they perform extremelly well. So what if they're built in China? They work just fine for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Piece of CRAP
Reviews.Author: Nilsar
Reviews.Content: I have owned multi radar detectors all Cobra models. My last ones were 965's. This XRS 9445 model is crap. It detects a cop and his radar at 1 car lenght and even then its only a 2 or 3 on the 0-10 scale. I tired returning it who said oh sorry it's 1 day pass your purchase. It was a present for wife as a replacement to her last detactor. Tired contacting the company Cobra. No responce. I have always purchased cobra detectors till now. After this last one I might have to look at others!

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9545 Review
Reviews.Author: mike122
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this radar detector and I'm very happy with it! It shipped very quickly and was easy to install. I especially like the scrolling display and modern design. The price was quite reasonable and significantly lower than other sites I searched.

Reviews.Title: Run of the mill detector
Reviews.Author: Ryan Doremus
Reviews.Content: This radar detector is pretty average if you ask me. A couple negatives, one its HUGE. You can't tell from the pics but this thing is way larger than it needs to be. Two the compass is virtually useless. It gets stuck on one direction after only a few turns. It seems to be fairly sensitive VERY sensitive when the POP setting is engaged. It does false alarm a fair amount...but they all do. It's saved me at least one ticket so if you ask me...it's paid for itself. Boil my review down...it's good but not great.

Reviews.Title: Great Great Great!
Reviews.Author: zuko
Reviews.Content: I could not ask for a better radar. This one is great! It picks up cops from behind a mountain and a mile away on the straight highway. It also picks up on the red light cameras and has a highway mode and a city mode. Great product! I have two of these and wouldn't trade them for anything!

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality - great deal
Reviews.Author: ttbess
Reviews.Content: I would strongly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a radar detector. The screen stays dark unless something is going on and when it does go off it is very clear about what it is picking up. We've had ours for almost a year and it still works great. I would recommend to anyone in the market.

Reviews.Title: Great So far
Reviews.Author: Sarah G.
Reviews.Content: As soon as I got it i hooked it up in my car. I did have to set the compass on it before i used it which meant driving around my block a few times before it calibrated. It had a few false alarms but overall it is a great radar protector. I'd rather have a few little false alarms than it not work at all and I get a ticket.

Reviews.Title: worth it
Reviews.Author: dwayne
Reviews.Content: it not too expensive and it works it is not as affective as your $200 ones but i haven't recieved a ticket since i got it it gives you enough warning to slow down the only thing is you gotta figure out the difference  between the noises it will pick up any motion detection system including the automatic doors like at wal mart

Reviews.Title: Nice radar
Reviews.Author: leebuck3
Reviews.Content: I like this detector alot.  It works from pretty far off and it rarely misses somthing.  I also like the voice alert as well.

Reviews.Title: Do not detect laser police cameras
Reviews.Author: Cobra
Reviews.Content: This detector claims to detect Laser, I have purchased it and took it to a country in Europe that uses laser and went through 10 different laser police Guns and did not detect them.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: dwg
Reviews.Content: Have had good luck with this model.  Seems to pick up signals at a considerable distance. Easy to use.  No fancy settings.

Reviews.Title: It's a Cobra!! What's there to say?
Reviews.Author: melissa m
Reviews.Content: For the last 15 years I have purchased nothing but Cobra radar detectors. Before that I had went with a few cheaper brands such as whistler etc. After the purchase of my first Cobra, I have bought nothing else since. The last one I owned lasted for more than 10 years and still works. The only reason I bought this one is I bought a new car and needed a new radar detector. :) Plus it is more advanced than the one I have already, it has a bigger band width. They have changed a bit. I had to program all of it's features which I never had to do before. Not sure I like that, I feel like I might not have done it right. But it detects like it is suppose to. It even spotted a couple of would be ticket writers that I didn't spot. My previous one was voice activated which is a feature I miss. But this one has something my prior one does not. It lowers the volume of itself after a couple of beeps. Which is great because that can be rather annoying, you know the constant loud beep. The other thing it does not do is go off when I pass every bank and grocery store in town. That's a plus. Oh and before I forget it does pick up radar behind you as well. It was confusing at first because the numbers would get larger as the officer got closer but then it would weaken and disappear. I guess he turned off the highway somewhere. Buy with confidence, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Cobra radar detector
Reviews.Author: Earcher
Reviews.Content: Does not pick up actual radar soon enough. Picks up alot of trash though. Beeps everytime a store is coming up but I have passed cops and it never go off.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Ralf
Reviews.Content: Great deal It arrive on time very easy to set didnt had no problem so far and it looks good thanks.

Reviews.Title: Effective but a little large
Reviews.Author: Christopher Seymour
Reviews.Content: The unit seems to operate quite well. Display is a bit hard to see at certain sun angles. I wish the unit had a smaller presence on the dashboard.

Reviews.Title: Garbage!!!  Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I normally don't give reviews, however, this one I had to 'chime-in'!Don't waste your time or money!  Radar detector goes full deflection either when it's too late or after the police has passed--useless!  Conduct your research and choose wisely.I transitioned to the Passport 8500 and it saved me from getting numerous tickets!  Check reviews on the Valentine 1 as well.  These two are the best in the market I believe.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: mrdarrin1022
Reviews.Content: This radar detector is awesome. You have to use common sense. This machine is not God. Cops are pretty smart they turn their radars on and off when they think a car is speeding. This detector has far more value than the price reflects. My previous one cost 3 times as much and was not half as good

Reviews.Title: Terrible detector - avoid this unit
Reviews.Author: C. Hyde "Cool Granny"
Reviews.Content: I owned another  COBRA detector for years ( wish I could tell you the number) so when it finally quit on me I did not even hesitate going out and buying two new units.  The Price was reasonable and my experience with Cobra gave me a comfort level. This detector cannot detect anything besides other detectors in other cars. I got a $300 ticket in January and it never went off until the unmarked car was almost parallel with me coming from the other direction. Two days ago I came over a slight rise in the highway to find three county sheriffs in the median - the detector never made a beep until I was parallel with the three of them and then continued for only a few hundred feet. No problem cause with this detector I don't even dare go more than 5 MPH over the limit !!!!!  My old cobra would go off if there was a police car anywhere wityhin two miles.  STAY AWAY from this unit

Reviews.Title: u will not regret this decision
Reviews.Author: tim g
Reviews.Content: The best radar ever but u gotta go into the settings and turn some of the bands on nice compass thos

Reviews.Title: Pays for itself
Reviews.Author: James Stringam
Reviews.Content: This little guy has saved me $300 bucks so far, and has kept me from getting my license suspended. I keep it on highway mode all the time, and learn to ignore false alarms and be on the lookout for unexpected triggers. The local police like to hide on the other side of hills, and it gives me plenty of notice every time. If you're willing to deal with false alarms and innovate a bit, then save yourself some money and get this one. If you aren't a drug runner or a street racer, if these are legal, if your state doesn't use lasers, and you just want to keep from getting dinged on your commute - this will definitely do the trick.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: the radar cobra 9345 is a product very good , i can detect the radar police, have a led display with numeric and is a nice product

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: RocketOverTexas
Reviews.Content: Compass is worthless...but the nut of the deal is that this product has already saved me from 3 tickets within a two weeks or so from purchasing this product.  (Both X band)  I have no idea what the Laser/Instant On/and all the fancy bands do yet because I mainly get hit by X and Ka, but the thing works and it has saved my rear so far from trouble.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Greg N.
Reviews.Content: I have been using my radar detector almost everyday since I got it. It has worked welled both on the highway (interstates and state highways) and in the city. Quite a few false alarms on certain roads, especially under signal lights when idling - I'll have to try out setting the RPM engine sensor that this model has.My one complaint (albeit small) is that the "what's in the box" description on Amazon says that a straight power cord is included and was something I wanted for my radar detector. However, after opening the package, I found a coiled cord - which now stretches across my dash board and radio. After contacting Amazon, they said they couldn't do anything about it other than provide a refund if I didn't want it anymore.

Reviews.Title: False beep for few minutes once started
Reviews.Author: Mahmudul H. Khan
Reviews.Content: Radar beeps continuously for few minutes after initial start up,  specially during the cold weather. After few minutes of false alarm it goes back to normal working mode. It's annoying for those initial few minutes and if you turn the sound off you may not remember to turn it back on while driving and end up getting the ticket.

Reviews.Title: Cobra Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: The Cobra XRS 9645 15 Band Radar/Laser Detector with New DigiView Data Display, Pop Mode Radar Gun works Great here in Maine, money better spent on this product than paying a fine !

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain
Reviews.Author: V. Hooper "V Hooper"
Reviews.Content: Excellent product for the money & excellent & expeditious shipping. Recommend it to everyone. WOrks great & alerts you to all radars & burglar alarms.

Reviews.Title: Saved me several tickets
Reviews.Author: jobgirl
Reviews.Content: I drive a lot every day so this is a must for me. This was a great detector for the money. It is a bit sensative sometimes, but very reliable and consistent. I would buy another one if they one stops working.

Reviews.Title: Hopefully it won't have to do it's job...
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: It hasn't had to do it's job yet, passed four cops but none were running radar. I hope it never actually has to work, but have it running any time I'm in the car so I know it will if it needs to. Gets very hot after the hour and a half commute, but that's nothing. The standard windshield mount it came with was cheaply made, didn't stick to the windshield, but it comes with Velcro to stick to your dash. Definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Sroller123
Reviews.Content: Very good product. I enjoy it very much. It works perfectly and have not had any problems with it at all.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9345 14-Band Radar/Laser Detector with POP-Mode Radar Gun Detection and VG-2/Spectre Alert I Surveillance Immunity
Reviews.Author: Cristian
Reviews.Content: this works well. not saying it couldnt be better but for the price, it beats the tickets you could be getting.

Reviews.Title: Nice paperweight
Reviews.Author: Stillhere
Reviews.Content: This detector would not go off even when I passed law enforcement officers standing on the side of the road while pointing their radar gun directly at me.  After realizing that it was not detecting radar, I reread the instructions and did the setup over, but it still didn't pick up radar signals the next time I was sure that radar was being pointed at me.  This thing is a piece of junk!

Reviews.Title: The laser notification goes off waaaaay too much
Reviews.Author: Christopher Coleman
Reviews.Content: Did save me from a ticket in south Georgia however the laser notification went off constantly over the trip making it a nuisance but I guess the 80 bucks spent was better than the 200 ticket it saved me from.

Reviews.Title: Works great most of the time
Reviews.Author: David Lawrence "Dallas"
Reviews.Content: I have had errors but when it goes off hard you better be going the speed limit. Very accurate on the highway.

Reviews.Title: BEST Radar for the price
Reviews.Author: mobilejray
Reviews.Content: I've owned many radar detectors and from different brands.I must say, for the price, this offers the best radar detection performance.The voice alert is nice along with InteliMute.Headphone jack so you can use the radar while your passengers are sleeping or put one earbud in your ear if you have your music turned up.Adjustable volume know (analog) and a mute button.Display is easy to read even in sunlight.I recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9645
Reviews.Author: avocruz
Reviews.Content: The Cobra XRS 9645 performs with great presicion and has an accurate compass. Since day one it exceeded my expectations . Great equipment to add to your car or truck.

Reviews.Title: Good Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: TB
Reviews.Content: This detector is amazing! I've only ever owned one other detector, but it was very basic and this blows that one out of the water.  This one gave me more than enough time to slow down. I have only one complaint and it is the cord.  I like that it's coiled, but I don't like to actually turn off my detector.  I usually just unplug the cord to shut it off. Yes I know it has a smart power shut off feature, but when I turned my car off I waited about 5-10 minutes and it never shut off, so I just unplug it. A few days ago when I did the plug broke, so I had to order a new one.  I guess I won't be lazy anymore and just flip the on/off switch. But overall,the actual radar is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Affordable option but if you need quality research pricier ones
Reviews.Author: Michel Thakur
Reviews.Content: Nice affordable detector nice designed compact and looks good on dashboard but sometimes misses signals and sometimes gives false ones.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed they don't mak'em like they use to.
Reviews.Author: 1bellydog
Reviews.Content: So disappointed, I had a Cobra radar detector for years and it worked great however this model sucks, it doesn't warn you until you have already seen the cop. I paid more than twice as much for this one as I did for my faithful old one that worked 20 times better. Very sad and sorry I bought it, they just don't mak'em like they use to, infact it's hard to find any made well anyone.

Reviews.Title: Cobra Radar Detector XRS 9345
Reviews.Author: Pierce "Pierce"
Reviews.Content: For a resonably priced detector, this one seems to work well.  I would prefer that the display would be brighter and the alarm louder but it is ok.  As far as the sensitivity - I really don't know yet since it was a Christmas gift and have not had much of a chance to use it.  If I were buying another detector, I think I would spend a little more money and get a better quality one.

Reviews.Title: Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: Rock
Reviews.Content: Got the detector in a timely manner and it seems to work very well. Range on some radars is suspect but still gives you a reaction time.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Paul A. San Miguel
Reviews.Content: We don't drive execessively fast 10-15 mph above the limit, but I wanted a radar detector that would give some peace of mind for avoiding a $200-$400 ticket. So, I looked at many other radar detectors, and on a 2,700 mile trip this one worked flawlessly and for about $60-$200 less. It detected every police with an active radar (note: we did pass many cruisers, but they probably did not have their radar active, and if the radar is not active, the detector does not activate). This device saved us at least 3 tickets where we slowed down, upon the alarm sounding, and a mile or two later saw a patrol cars parked just over the hill/past a curve a mile or two later. There were many false alarms, but mainly in city areas with high traffic, which is hard to avoid.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Z28 Dude
Reviews.Content: For the price its a nice radar if you can't buy a belletronics or valentine detector. I would buy again if needed.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: This radar detetector is everything the literture promotes and more. I wanted something with voice alerts as well as digital read-outs and this fit the bill to a tee. It's accurate and easy to set up and install. I did my research when choosing this product and I'm happy with my choice. I checked everywhere from the tv shopping channels websites to the price shopper websites and Amazon gave me the best deal.

Reviews.Title: OK so far
Reviews.Author: Yancy Darringer
Reviews.Content: It works as well as my last one but it has many setting and the owner manual is a bit vague as towhat they really do. Nice to have the voice telling you there may be a police person coming up.

Reviews.Title: good not great
Reviews.Author: teach68
Reviews.Content: Have purchased 3 voice alert Cobras.  Two have died after about 2-3 years due to speaker failure.  The third is still working but I will not purchase a Cobra again.  After the first failure I contacted Cobra and they gave me a coupon for $50 toward a new one but after the 2nd detector speaker died Cobra said "too bad".  Otherwise I have been pleased with the operation.

Reviews.Title: defective unit.
Reviews.Author: defective-detector
Reviews.Content: Defective unit- customer service would not replace 'only repair' with 3 week turn aroundproceed with caution

Reviews.Title: Dosent identify all radar
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I've been using thios obe for one year and there was many times that it didnt got the radars. so not really happy

Reviews.Title: Not impressed...
Reviews.Author: RandomReviewer
Reviews.Content: Credibility: Used multiple radar detectors.Review: This thing doesn't seem to detect radars at a distance, in effect, making it a bit useless. I drive by multiple speed radars (daily) that display the car's speed, and it detects it when it's about 30-40 yards away... I'm ALWAYS able to see the cop car or radar post before Cobra warns me (around 5 seconds for Cobra to respond). I've also driven by cop cars and "parked" cop cars (not sure if they were shooting radar, was on a highway, so I'm assuming they were) and Cobra doesn't warn me (but again, they might not have been shooting).I've had other brand radar detectors that detect radar guns at ~4x the distance of this one for the SAME PRICE. And my (non Cobra) other one actually warned me every time I drove by a cop car, hence I assumed all cop cars had radar ON as default... guess not with Cobra.If I had a second chance, I would have bought something else.

Reviews.Title: XRS 9445
Reviews.Author: H. Macalincag "HMAC from SC"
Reviews.Content: I had this unit for over a month now. I got me a cobra due to it's features and cost compared to other leading brands. To tell you honestly, i am not that amaze but just ok. There are times that the alarm would go off when the patrol car is only..maybe a 100 meters away or maybe less, you wouldn't know, cops already got you. I also cant tell whats the difference between a false alert to a real one. There are a lot of instances that i pass by a patrol car without the unit go off...now thats alarming for me, good thing i was within the speed limit those times. As i've said it's just ok for me, not jumping happy about it.

Reviews.Title: AWSOME
Reviews.Author: Cameron J. Snodgrass "cameron s"
Reviews.Content: i have always been skeptical about these sort of things but i decided i wanted to get one and it took me hours to look through all of them amazon had to offer but i picked this one i have had it for bout 2 weeks now and it has saved me from 3 tickets already and the text display is really nice and it even has bars on it that tell u how strong the signal is i would definatly recommend this to anyone and everyone that wants one there is only one bad thing and thats the velcro it sticks to my car very well but not the unit but some super glue easily fixes that

Reviews.Title: Good radar detector that has paid for itself many times over!
Reviews.Author: jjceo
Reviews.Content: I have had this radar detector for over two years now and it has worked extremely well.  I purchased it for several reasons but the primary ones were, a good effective range, 15 bands of detection and it also works on radar and laser speed guns.I don't generally speed and try to drive carefully so the primary reason for this in my vehicle is to keep me alert.  Like most people, when the speed is 45 MPH I drive 45 MPH but that can get you in trouble when you enter one of the 12 school zones within 5 miles of our home.  The speed limits drop to 25 MPH during certain times of the day and while I try to always go slow I am just glad to have this in the window for a backup to my speed awareness.Like most radar detectors it goes off too much and for many reasons.  It can be set off by some banks that have radar motion detectors, store automatic doors and several other reasons.  I don't care because it makes me slow down and be more observant of what is around me.  Once you get used to it being there it is a trusted friend that is just one of the tools you use while driving.The range is very good as in the areas we live in the roads are mostly straight and it will detect radar from ½ mile to over a mile away from your car.  It has saved me multiple times from getting a ticket and in that way I have become accustomed to trusting it as a reliable device.  I like that it speaks to you with a voice an also has a text display that tells me what kind of warning I am getting.For over two years this unit has worked flawlessly and the quality and reliability of the radar detector is good. I recommend it to you as a good product and I would even buy it again if this one were to break.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Clint W. Berg
Reviews.Content: this product works great it picks up a lot more things a lot faster than my old radar detector. and you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Theres a reason it's so cheap..
Reviews.Author: P. Bomzer "Radar user"
Reviews.Content: This thing is ridiculous. It beeps when it shouldn't and doesn't when it should. I've tried putting it up high or down low on the windshield, neither works. I drive and hour to school just on route 80 in nj. There are so many traps there. I passed 2 coming home this weekend and the radar didn't beep once, but when I got off the highway on the exit ramp The signal went up to 4, then stopped completely. Absolutely worthless piece of junk, If your going to buy a radar, I suggest you buy a 200 or 300$ product, they will actually be worth it.

Reviews.Title: No more tickets for meeeeee!
Reviews.Author: T. Mathes "Tinks"
Reviews.Content: This thing works awesome!! I know there is a cop WAYYYY before I get to him even over hills before he is in sight. This product has saved me lots of money already I don't know why I didn't get one sooner!

Reviews.Title: HUGE disappointment.....
Reviews.Author: GWB
Reviews.Content: Very upset with this Cobra product. I thought it would replace my 15+ year old Uniden Stalker (3 band) that I still have, but the Uniden is hardwired in my personal truck and I have since received a company truck. So instead of spending the money to uninstall/reinstall, I went with this model due to reputation. OUCH !!! I have used this for the last 3 days, here is the synopsis in a nutshell:Average of 3 hours on the Highway, 2 hours through the City, all while in "highway" (h) mode.Numerous "X", "K", "Ka", 1 "Ku", 0 "Laser", 17 POP and 1 VG-2........NEVER an officer within view of any alerts.Three times I knew I was coming up on "hidden" spots that held officers.......all 3 times they were there, and I heard nothing.I viewed 5 patrols with people already pulled over as I passed......nothing.Twice, I was @ a red-light intersection with lights-flashing and an Ambulance trying to get through.......nothing.Once, I had a Sheriff in a Tahoe traveling behind me for 4-5 miles......nothing.Luckily I don't have a ticket, then again, I don't trust this radar so I'm keeping it pretty cool on the 1 1/2 hour one-way travel to work. I wish I would have just paid the extra money (more than this $70 item) and had my old-schooler reinstalled into my newest vehicle. Not sure what I am going to do since I took pride in knowing I was getting a Cobra and threw the packaging away. Guess I'll use it as a paperweight......cause unless the Texas officers are now using hidden vehicles and/or spaceships......this thing is FULL of false alarms and no help to me.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Blake
Reviews.Content: My previous Cobra radar detector lasted me 3 years, and after a year or so of the speaker being blown out I decided to get a new one. The only problem I have had with this item so far is that the fuse in the plug for the car fell out and got thrown away because we had no idea what it was too. A few days later we found out when I plugged it in and it didnt work. We got a new fuse and it works just fine. I would totally recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: DON'T Buy This Item!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: If this device would alert you in advance of radar in the area it would be a good purchase.  There is very little warning when the radar is facing, at the side or behind you with this unit.  I read the manual, have the appropriate settings in place, correct placement in the car for total view of signal and the sensitivity for true alerts is ridiculously low!  I had the earlier model cobra of this save version and it was a great unit.  This one is going in the garbage.

Reviews.Title: Cobra radar
Reviews.Author: Y. Lyashenko
Reviews.Content: I think since its not very expensive, the quality wouldn't be the same as 300 dollar ones. Sometimes on the road, we would pass a police vehicle and it would not even signal. But for the money, I think its worth it.

Reviews.Title: Seems Good
Reviews.Author: Richard Dewitt "rainiertx"
Reviews.Content: For the price I have no complaints. I have purchased more expensive detectors and this seems to detect just as much if not more radar than the more expensive ones.

Reviews.Title: Keeps me honest
Reviews.Author: Radioman "WEB"
Reviews.Content: I am quite happy with the unit. It does seem to give numerous false alerts. But just because you do not see the police does NOT mean that they don't have their eye on you. Given the quantity of electronic units out there that emit radio signals and the number of vehicles/buildings, etc. that reflect and mix those signals, it does not surprise me that the unit occasionally reports false alerts. Out on the open road, it seems to work flawlessly. If I get an alert on the road, I pay attention and check my speed. It has saved me a few times, The other info it gives me is useful as well. I am thoroughly happy with the unit.

Reviews.Title: Did not work well for me
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: The detector will only pick up police that are directly in front of you with their lights on and will not pick up any police on the side of the roads in hide outs.

Reviews.Title: Not an Escort
Reviews.Author: YoBro
Reviews.Content: After owning this unit for the last 6 mos, I'm ready to go back to Escort. I was willing to give this unit a try after my 5 yr old Escort was stolen from my vehicle. I've worked the Cobra through all its settings and have had it with all the false alarms. Add to that ineffective mounting cups (falls a lot), a difficult to reach mute button (not cord based), and even accuracy issues with the compass. The Escort model (yes, double the price), is better quality and technology on all fronts. Which is especially important in urban areas where false broadcasts are everywhere and every town is employing different bands and ticketing technologies. I give this two stars because the Cobra can save you from a ticket, but expect 10 to 20 falses for each true warning signal in urban areas. For me, it's back to an Escort.

Reviews.Title: WASTE OF MONEY!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: jhoan juarez
Reviews.Content: Don't waste ur money this thing ways annoying signaling a radar signal literally every 3-5 minutes but when a cop was was really using a speed gun I never got no sort of of warning at ALL. I got pulled over twice n decided to get rid of it once a got a ticket I have just decided to be more cautious now

Reviews.Title: exactly what it promises
Reviews.Author: Heath Crothers
Reviews.Content: Not only I, but also my friends have this model or a similar one, and we all love ours. this is the epitome of what a radar detector should be. It comes with its own window mount and instruction book that takes you through every feature on it. i dont recommend the smart  mute at all, you bought it to detect, so why turn it off. it is easily removable and has always given me a heads up of an officer radar gunning people. Im not saying you should speed, but if you want a full proof detector that will pick up all the bands and perform as well as the high dollar detectors, cobra is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to Properly Review
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Right now it is difficult for me to accurately leave a review for this item. I have never owned a radar detector, and am not familiar how they work. I purchased this item because I need one for the car I just purchased. I figured when I purchased it that upon reading the owner' s manual, and familiarizing myself with it, I would have no problem in using this product. Well, that is where my problem begins. I received my order three days ago, and upon opening the packaging yesterday, noticed that there was not a owner's manual or instructions for use included with this item. This now leaves me with having to try to search the internet for a copy of instructions. Until then, I cannot accurately rate this product. If I had to leave a rating now, it would be negative due to the fact that I have no idea how to use this. Once I am able to research this further, and hopefully find and instruction guide on the internet, I will be more than happy to come back and re-rate this product.

Reviews.Title: Falses wayyyy too much....constant X
Reviews.Author: greg bacino
Reviews.Content: Blech...falses way too much...constant x band warning. But did have nice read out  to tell u it was falsing lol

Reviews.Title: just ok
Reviews.Author: David B. Proffitt "The Engineer"
Reviews.Content: This radar dector beeps when the cop is on top you. its never beeped 1 mile away and I have it setting pefectly hanging on the inside of my windshield!!!:)

Reviews.Title: Excelent product
Reviews.Author: jfrancosaa
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto que haya comprado via internet, todo lo que se describe lo hace muy facil de manejar y a bajo costoCobra XRS9670 15 Band Radar/Laser Detector with DigiView Data Display and 8-Point Electronic Compass

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: Thouvht I'd get more for the price. Sometimes it doesn't alert me of a cop until after I've seen them myself.

Reviews.Title: Way too many false warnings
Reviews.Author: Ron F. Spector "Ron S."
Reviews.Content: First off, this radar detector is way too large.  Others on the market are much more compact.  I have a belltronics radar detector in my other car and on the same drive every day to the office, my cobra goes off 4x the amount of my other one.  It also appears to be set off by other radar detectors.  Piece of junk, will be replacing it with maybe another belltronics.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Mrs. "Gwen"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband.  He likes it a lot.  The device gives many codes as it picks up different signals so it is necessary to read the directions before using it.

Reviews.Title: Go ahead and spend the extra $200 for the escort passport
Reviews.Author: PDD "PDD"
Reviews.Content: It doesn't give you much heads up at all, if any, the money spent on a ticket would justify spending $200 more to get the top of the line escort passport

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: Works but only gives you like a 5 second warning and by that time the cop might already have you.... not worth the money. spend the money on a better one

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9945
Reviews.Author: shakyshaky
Reviews.Content: I already bought one of these an I know without a dough that it preforms great. My friend saw it preform an he ordered one. So if you want a good radar detector at a cheap price you will not go wrong with this one, I know !!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Paid For Itself On My First Road Trip
Reviews.Author: Talisker
Reviews.Content: Got this detector for a road trip from Colorado to Michigan. Saved me from tickets many times on the long stretches in Nebraska and Iowa. Takes up very little space on the dash I highly recommend

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Joanna Pickering
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this product and as always with the quick shipping. Nice styling and haven't had a false reading on it even while driving in the city.

Reviews.Title: seems nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this specifically for a road trip we were taking, and then I thought that my husband could use it in his car because he travels a lot with work.  At first it went off a lot when I was just driving my normal day, so I put it on city and then it quietened down.  It went off once for the "pop".  Then when we went on our trip we put it on highway.  The whole way down it didn't make a peep.  I was a little nervous that it wasn't working but I didn't see any police either.  On the way back it was the same, however this time we saw about 4 police; either on the side of the road or behind us pulling people over.  Fortunately we didn't get pulled over but this thing was very quiet.I was super disappointed because this was a good price, set up was pretty easy to figure out, it has great features for the price.  It took me forever to find a radar detector that had good reviews for the price we wanted to pay and this one seemed to be the one. I will probably send it back, but I think I'll keep it in my car for a bit just to see how it works because you never really know what police are doing.

Reviews.Title: Its okay for radar...
Reviews.Author: hugh jass
Reviews.Content: I found out the hard way that this detector will not detect laser unless it is shooting directly at the detector.  This being said, the beam on these radar guns is only about a nickel in diameter.  I got a speeding ticket the other day using it and the cop was cool enough to explain to me that they aim for your license plate which renders this detector useless.  The cop then to show me how it worked walked in front of the car 10 feet to set it off.  It took him two times before he was able to get the detector to go off.  Later on that night someone broke in my car and stole it...  They can have it after all I just had a false sense of security with it anyways.  I would not recommend this detector unless you want it to detect radar which puts out a wider beam for lack of a better word.

Reviews.Title: Great detector for the Price
Reviews.Author: K. Woodward "Workplace Learning"
Reviews.Content: I bought this detector for a trip from FLA to OHIO.It went off alot for items like speed and traffic detectors - but it also went off for Laser! saved me a 300 dollar ticket - so it paid for itself.purchase the GPS auxiallry pice if you want to eliminate the false readings.be sure to switch to city mode when nearing an urban area.only con: SMALL ON light is impossible to see in the daytime.-Kevin

Reviews.Title: More than what I really needed
Reviews.Author: Miss B.
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with this radar detector. To be honest I know I'm not using it to it's full potential, it has so many features which I don't feel that I need. But anymore a radar detector doesn't just warn you when there is a radar gun near by. My major con to this is that the cord is almost too short to reach from my windsheild to where my outlet is in my Magnum. The cord wiggles loose after a while due to the distance. I like the Full-Color DataGrafix Display, but dislike the fact that it doesn't stay on the entire time.

Reviews.Title: Cobra
Reviews.Author: MS
Reviews.Content: Radar is pathetic. You can be right next to the cop with his radar gun out, and it won't even beep a lll the way. sometimes it doesn't even beep..worst detector ever.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift!
Reviews.Author: Brit1219 "Brit S."
Reviews.Content: Works Great! Perfect gift for my mom. Its easy to use and very accurate. You can pin point and find the cop if you really want to or sit somewhere else and watch him radar other people.Update 4/17/14I have bought a second one and both of them are still working great. The hardest part about it is setting up the compass however it is still very accurate. I have to note that the window hang isn't very helpful however it does work, just needs to be adjusted every now and than.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: O. Jalloun
Reviews.Content: Tried this detector and it works great. Early detection works about 95% of the time.Overall, based on the price, its more than worth the money

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mikel  W Anderson
Reviews.Content: I originally ordered one of these for my truck and it kept me from getting any tickets I have had it for about a year and a half now and still going strong and I just picked up another one for my Subaru, for the price you can't beat it. yeah it might not go off when theres a cop next to you but the the cop has to have his equipment on for the detector to respond. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone good buy worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: lbarria
Reviews.Content: I researched many sites and this seemed to be the best deal. It's a really good radar detector and I recommend you to get it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Feisal H. Kassem "Benhashim"
Reviews.Content: I love this product. It works every time and I always use it while driving on the interstates. Spares you lots of hard time if caught with few extra MPH. Legal in PA, check the laws of your state!

Reviews.Title: stopped working
Reviews.Author: cd
Reviews.Content: it worked for 2 weeks and stopped working. i even plugged it into a new adapter and it's the actual detector

Reviews.Title: Great Radar/Lidar Detector
Reviews.Author: ee-me2014
Reviews.Content: This product works great, has saved me from a ticket a couple times.That doesn't mean it can preform miracles, the cop still has to be using their radar/laser in order to warn you.Be sure to turn on all the bands when you set it up (setup is fast and easy, instructions included), even the Ku band (I caught the Wisconsin State Patrol using it).It is also necessary to ensure that the rear facing laser eye has an unobstructed view out the rear window.For this price it can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: It detects everything, so safe, but so annoying
Reviews.Author: SergioV
Reviews.Content: The product is high quality, easy to set up, and definitively will alert you of a Police Radar, it scans all practical bands and gives you early warning. But there is a downside: Too many false positives, even on city mode and with the auto-mute function. So if you are not annoyed with this thing beeping all the time, it is the right product for you.

Reviews.Title: Worst suction cups ever
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: I contacted Cobra via their website and requested a new mounting bracket. They sent a new bracket within days, very good support. This one seems a little more sturdy and does stick to the windshield.Now i can review the detector.This detector seems to work very well even from behind. For the money, it's worth it if you can get a new mounting bracket.I have no idea how well the detector works because the suction cups don't stick to the windshield!Horrible!

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: It doesn't detect any of the newer system used today, I have gone through speed trapes and it doesn't make a sound.  I guess I got what I pay for, an out dated model.  It does detect the Rescue alert.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9545
Reviews.Author: Anthony Palmer
Reviews.Content: One simple work "junk"! Just this pasted Fourth of July weekend, me and my wife received a ticket for doing over nine miles per hour coming through Tallahassee, FL. A state trooper was hiding down below a hill, when he got us. We thought because the trooper was hiding below the hill, the radar could not pick him up. Later we tested radar out on straight highway and the results showed radar only worked when "Smokey's radar" directly pointing at you, meaning 25ft. in front of you. By that time, you already have a ticket! Go figurer!Wish wife had tested before Amazon's 30 return policy expired.I will never buy anymore Cobra products again. Now, we are now considering purchasing a "Valentine One". Cobra is straight "junk"!

Reviews.Title: Another fine Cobra product
Reviews.Author: memay "memay_ok"
Reviews.Content: I don't know what the 1 star reviewers are doing or expecting. This detector, which replaced a FILTCHED 10 band Cobra that had saved me numerous times, does exactly what it is supposed to; detect and warn you of radar survalance.It works, and it required no tweeking.  I highly recomend it.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY, PLEASE DONT, JUST NO COBRA
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: Terrible product, have had it for two weeks and have not been warned of a cop ONCE. This ONLY picks up ezpass signals and camera's on top of traffic lights. It might really be the worst product I have ever bought. This morning alone I saw it completely ignore two posted state troopers ( i live in nj). Just dont buy it, whatever you do just please keep looking for a better one.

Reviews.Title: not so suitable for UK
Reviews.Author: Travelguidebarbie "Travelguidebarbie"
Reviews.Content: Probably my fault buying it in USA. I was expecting great things in UK, however it only detect some cameras and cannot be relied upon. The supplier however gave excellent service and did not cause this issue.

Reviews.Title: Guardian Angel
Reviews.Author: Venomess
Reviews.Content: This is my guardian angel!  I would probably have had my license revoked by now (with the way I like to drive) if not for this little toy.  A must have for anyone that DRIVES!!

Reviews.Title: Avoid this product.
Reviews.Author: JNV "JV"
Reviews.Content: For the price of this product one would think it should last longer than the 4 months it lasted for me. After four months the product has died and no luck on product support from Cobra. So I am only left to believe that Cobra makes an inferior product that does not last. Save the money and just buy from another company. From my short time with a working product it seemed to work but is nothing greater than much cheaper products I've had before.

Reviews.Title: Good and Bad.......mostly bad.
Reviews.Author: Ryan A. Rounsaville
Reviews.Content: The radar detector picks up the stores security systems fine......cops not so much. I was alerted of a local cop sitting up the road with a reasonable amount of distance...great. Though a state trooper is different. X band kicks on at last second...heard it beep and looked to my left and theres a statey sittin. Another time a state trooper drove pass me....nothing until he was behind me. X band went on and instantly at 5 strength after he went by. Not a sound when an ambulance came up behind me. I have used it for about two months now so the testing will continue so far its receiving a D. Next detector most likely will be a whistler.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Henrik Schmidt "schmidt"
Reviews.Content: Does not have all the user interface bells and whistles - but works really well

Reviews.Title: Tony McNees
Reviews.Author: Anthony R. Mcnees
Reviews.Content: This is a good unit, works well on my motorcycle. Haven't received a ticket yet!

Reviews.Title: Did not seem as effective as other reviewers claim
Reviews.Author: Brian Scheets
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for a trip out to Indiana from New Jersey. The mechanism designed to keep it in place itself was bad and poorly/cheaply made. After placing that in multiple locations and finally settling on one place in the center of the windshield I wanted to see what It would do. The honest assessment was very little. It was set off sporadically by  speed signs that document your speed, and radio towers. Every speed trap besides one went unnoticed by this detector. POP mode went off but there was nothing more (I am still not sure I understand it.) Nevertheless, I think I will be returning this one for a more reviewed item.Best of luck with the Unit if you choose to keep it!

Reviews.Title: Worst Cobra Product I've Ever Had
Reviews.Author: Frijoles
Reviews.Content: This radar detector detects false alarms about 95% of the time.  I wish I could return it.  Nothing like previous Cobra radar detectors I have owned, which worked great. I would not recommend this particular model to anyone who is in the market for a radar detector.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: hengar
Reviews.Content: So far so good, a bit bulky and hard to place on the windshield due to its shape.

Reviews.Title: False WARNINGSS
Reviews.Author: anthony
Reviews.Content: Too many false signals... It's sad because i wish it could work like everyones. SO MANY FALSE WARNINGS. I tried to verify and see if the signals that  im picking up are falso by looking for cops but I never saw one.

Reviews.Title: It's Okay!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy D. Greer
Reviews.Content: So if your looking for a cheap radar that kinda gets the job done, well then this Cobra is for you.I found it to work ok for awhile then, it thinks on-coming traffic (headlights) are radars. A ton of false alarms, wouldn't even count in one 30min trip to work.I would agree around state patrol vehicles it doesn't work. I would pass trooper and maybe pick up KA-1 at most.TIME for a upgrade jumping over to Beltronics Radar's, Cobra has let me down twice now.Overall review 2.5 out of 5 stars "not worth the time or money"

Reviews.Title: FORMATION ON WHAT ALL COMANDS MEAN  LIKE XBAN K BAND AND SO ON
Reviews.Author: Cherryl L Hobson
Reviews.Content: PLEASE SEND INFO. TO HEH4509@AOL.COM  THANKS AS SOON AS I UNDERSTAND WHAT ALL OF THE CODES MEAN I SURE I WILL LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Awesome Whistler
Reviews.Author: Gods child
Reviews.Content: I haven't got many false alerts . So far this cobra exceed my expectations with it's fourteen bands and high pitched sounds ! It's detected several units.  I have really enjoyed its whistle .I recommend this product  because of its affordable price and wonderful performance !

Reviews.Title: Was a Gift -Works as Expected
Reviews.Author: L Schulz
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, only having an older model myself, and being satisfied with that, I can't really speak to the reliability of this model. The recipient of it seems to find it satisfactory.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: jarallah
Reviews.Content: Deduct Laser/Radar in short distance t, so you can't manage your speed to make it slow I I I I I

Reviews.Title: Sharp design
Reviews.Author: Phil LeFebvre "MiXTC"
Reviews.Content: No problems.  It's still new but it works well.  Needed to buy the longer straight cord from Cobra due to lighter in console--too far away.

Reviews.Title: nope
Reviews.Author: Larry Morris
Reviews.Content: Didn't work. A motor cop radar was on my car for three blocks and it never went off. Lucky for me I saw him. Wish I could return it

Reviews.Title: One of the best
Reviews.Author: Kyan Fonville
Reviews.Content: This radar detector has never let me down I absolutely love it! It's not too big it's very easy to place in and out of the window.

Reviews.Title: My corbra xrs 9745 radar/laser detector works
Reviews.Author: Roy Armstrong
Reviews.Content: unlike all radar/laser this detector beeps at every thing. I think it could be reset. But until then I will leave it as is. I think it beeps at other people radar detector passing bye or a police person I just did not see.

Reviews.Title: Saves money
Reviews.Author: Aseel Aljarallah
Reviews.Content: I got this two months ago and works well. For some reason it gives false alarm with any Audi car around.

Reviews.Title: Laser FAIL
Reviews.Author: P
Reviews.Content: This works great when warning of road construction, but absolutely did not see the LIDAR that Illinois police were using last summer.  Was mounted high in the line of sight, and not so much as a peep.  Not a good investment.

Reviews.Title: Too Many false readings
Reviews.Author: Omar Chavez
Reviews.Content: I bought this product because i had good experience with cobra radars.  But this particular one is so annoying and it beeps like crazy.  I read all the instructions and played with the settings and still false readings.  I miss my old 29.99 radar that i got from walmart that worked perfectly! But i just put this one away since its completely unreliable and annoying.  Dont buy!

Reviews.Title: dont buy!
Reviews.Author: STAN
Reviews.Content: Horrible. They say that this radar is one of the top radar but the one I got was horrible. Doesn't pick up anything but false alarms. Then I contacted cobra and they won't do anything about it. Do not get this.

Reviews.Title: Do not recommend
Reviews.Author: PR
Reviews.Content: Does not work  well at all. Ka pulse is not picked up. Did not realize that when I was buying it. Do not buy it. Go for whistler instead.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected at all
Reviews.Author: Steve LeBlanc
Reviews.Content: Well I definitely got a radar detector, problem is that it for sure works, but you have to be in pretty close range for it to detect radars/lasers. I set it up as instructed per the directions that came with it and turned on the features I wanted and turned off the ones I didn't want, mounted it in the proper location, etc. It will start to pick up police shooting radar/laser when its almost too late. I've found that it will start to pick up at about 200-300 yards, which to me is a very short distance for a radar detector. By that time the cop has seen you and your getting pulled over. However, it is great if you want to pick up "X" band activity such as door sensors and other misc. things. I'm pretty disappointed and feel like I'm now out of $65. I feel like I should have just spent the money and got an Escort or Valentine One. My friend has an Escort and it picks up, what seems like, a mile away. Plenty of time to slow down and be cautious. Definitely do your research before you purchase. Hope this review helps!

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Saina S.
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband originally but ended up putting it in my car. It totally saves me from so many tickets. Love it!

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Aimee
Reviews.Content: This has worked whenever a cop car has gone by. Obviously it doesn't go off if the radar isn't on. Sometimes it will go off from alarm systems, either that or there's been cops that I didn't notice. It has definitely got me out of possible tickets.

Reviews.Title: saved my ass from tickets at least 45 times in the first week
Reviews.Author: Chris Wilson
Reviews.Content: saved my ass from tickets at least 45 times in the first week, now I just need a supercharger and im set : )

Reviews.Title: Already has saved me some $$$!
Reviews.Author: H. C. Keith
Reviews.Content: Works great - keeps me out of trouble on my morning50 mile commute!  I don't speed much, but it alerts me before the blue lights do!

Reviews.Title: Cobra 14 Band Voice Alert Radar
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline R. Ford
Reviews.Content: Love this item.  Works fine and picks up alerts even if it is not put on your windshield.  This is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Didn't like it.
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I drove by few cops and it didn't go off. It also pick up alot of weird signal. Overall i didn't think it was a good product.

Reviews.Title: Good first radar detector
Reviews.Author: Adam P Burke
Reviews.Content: The XRS 9545 is the first radar detector I've ever bought. It is a relatively cheap detector, but it works. The best thing about it is that it has a lot of settings the user can tinker with. The XRS 9545 is good enough for someone like me who was looking to see how a radar detector works, and learn how the different features radar detectors offer. I would not recommend it to a hardcore driver, because it does pop a lot of false alarms. The good news, though, is based on my  location, surroundings, and the low signal strength of false alarms, they are usually easy to identify.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9445
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: Excellent radar detector! Works like a charm. I had owned this same model back in 2008 when I drove from CA to Louisiana and back it was awesome I was doing between 90-100mph my entire trip. Lost it when I divorced so when I saw it for sale on amazon I snatched it up!!! Deffinatley worth the money. You won't be dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Not Worth It
Reviews.Author: Jlap53
Reviews.Content: By this being my radar detector, I wanted to take enough time to accurately assess this item. After giving myself 2 months and putting it through several situations such as driving in the city, suburb, rural areas and state to state driving, I can honestly say that this one is a waste on money.Key assessment:Range- Early on, I was nervous because I felt like the range wasn't good but I would make excuse for it until I got a speeding ticket. My detector alerted me after i was clocked and he was pulling me over.Some days the range is, at most, a quarter mile.False Alerts-- I get more pop alerts than anything and spec alerts but I have never seen any law enforcement anywhere with those alerts. K band and x band are rarely false alerts. Even if it's a door, it's not a false alert.Bells and whistles-- The 360 detection has a blind spot on the driver side. The emergency signal and train signal doesn't works. An ambulance passed through my laser and it alerted me that one time but that was too late.All in all, you can get what this has to offer in the cheapest detector. I wouldn't buy again. After not trusting it before the ticket, it is no longer with me.

Reviews.Title: Nothing great for the price
Reviews.Author: IVON McARTHUR
Reviews.Content: Even when cops are close it does not go off.  Suction cups which came with the system do not work.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk !!!
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: Got this and used it on a trip OMG this is a peace of s*** !!!! Will alarm you just in time for a ticket !!!..  I do not know if mine was a melon but i got read of it once back home...This radar will alarm (Ka-band) you 50-100 feet from the cops... !!!!  I even try it on a street speed sign running k band it will pick up the same 50-100 feet  way too late !!!!  Please do not buy it !!!!!!  get something different but not cobra !!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal, Great Radar
Reviews.Author: Elden Domingo
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an upgrade from my older Cobra and I am glad I did.  It has saved me multiple tickets in less than a month.

Reviews.Title: Good for using in EUA but does not work properly in Brazil
Reviews.Author: Danilo Turbiani
Reviews.Content: I bought this producty with the intention of using it in Brazil, I was wondering how accurate would it be here, but I got disappointed because it does not work properly in Brazil. does not "bip" with fixed radar too!Não funciona direito no BRasil, pega muita interferência principalmente na cidade. Não avisa dos radares fixos

Reviews.Title: great price and quality
Reviews.Author: miguel parra
Reviews.Content: I received my radar very quickly and it did not disappoint it was brand new in box and is working very well.. highly recommended

Reviews.Title: very practical
Reviews.Author: alejandro e. sureda
Reviews.Content: I like the simplicity that has the equipment.The operation of it is very good. Detects all kind of radar.The point to improve is that the cable should be longerTotally recommended.

Reviews.Title: Top Notch Radar detector for the $$$$
Reviews.Author: Mark P. in Texas
Reviews.Content: For the $$$ you can't go wrong !!!  Fully programable with many options to choose from. A very Nice Radar Detector !!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent radar detector!
Reviews.Author: Francis A. Russell "Frank"
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with Cobra in general and this detector in particular!  It is ready with current radars as well as near future radar.  ( KU band). Worked great out of the box and continues to meet my expectations!

Reviews.Title: Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: Geo
Reviews.Content: No problem with this unit.  I feel I got what I paid for and would buy again. Way to go Cobra!

Reviews.Title: Funciona
Reviews.Author: jreyesmacias
Reviews.Content: Fácil de usar y de instalar, presenta falsos positivos, que cuando uno aprende a identificarlos se usa con tranquilidad, es preferible que avise por exceso que por falta. Sería bueno que tuviese opción de idiomas.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Dylan
Reviews.Content: Bought this item with confidence and thought it would work good because of all of the new technology these days I got 2 speeding tickets in two weeks. One on the jersey turnpike and another on the Long Island expressway both got me with a radar gun and the cobra did not sense it at all. I am very disappointed with this product.

Reviews.Title: love love love it
Reviews.Author: kori
Reviews.Content: i actually had one before. and it ended up breaking so as soon as it broke i got another one on here

Reviews.Title: Worked great for a while...
Reviews.Author: Aggietoker
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like this unit but it just didn't deliver. It has a lot of features, not all work well or at all it seems. after a few months, it constantly goes off and never stops so I have to turn it off or unplug it. I'm assuming it's gone haywire but it does have its good days so I still keep it in the car.

Reviews.Title: Completely useless. I surrender to cops now.
Reviews.Author: Song Liao
Reviews.Content: Why a product like this should exist, I tell you, I was driving 70mph on speed limit 55, and this radar did not catch police until almost I passed him! I got a ticket thanks to this !The cable is also annoying, it has to be constantly connected to power in order to function.My fellows, just stick to the speed limit rule, don't try to get 2 minutes out of your one hour drive. You can't fight the system, cops always have better ways to catch speeders.

Reviews.Title: It's worth it. I love it
Reviews.Author: Memory
Reviews.Content: There may be quite a few "false" alarms, etc, but it honestly doesn't bother me. It's already paid well over itself, and I can speed with ease. In my opinion, definitely worth buying.

Reviews.Title: I bought two
Reviews.Author: archie
Reviews.Content: Its a fantastic product that i bought two of them.Only gripe is, i had to set the user setting to what setting i wanted and that compass i can do without.

Reviews.Title: works so far
Reviews.Author: Brett Garrett
Reviews.Content: I have not had it out to much but seems to work as advertised. I did not upgrade to the red light camera tracker so i can not comment on that. I have had a couple false alerts but not bad for the price.

Reviews.Title: This is an ok device
Reviews.Author: Jessica Roth "sandlot76"
Reviews.Content: This is an ok device.  Not great, not bad, VERY middle of the road.The emergency feature... where it alerts you when a fire truck or ambulance is coming... is a failure.  Sometimes it alerts you a full block or 2 away, other times the emergency vehicle is on top of you before it alerts you.The feature about silencing alerts based on it detection the RPM's of your engine, does not work very well either, regardless of how the device is mounted and so... i have turnd that feature off.I wish the volume which goes from 1 - 9... really started at 1 for the volume of 1 on this device is like a 3 on any other.  Even on 1 it's loud and often annoying.The filtering of misc. radars/door openers/security alarms... is average.So in the end... i like this device but it's simply "ok".This is my first time with the brand.  I've always been a BELL fan but those things now... for the good ones... are hundreds of bucks.So, if you need something that is relatively inexpensive... this machine works.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Buyer
Reviews.Content: Product came quickly & packed well. It was as described & made a great gift. Would buy again for another gift.

Reviews.Title: great unit
Reviews.Author: busa
Reviews.Content: Great unit has paid for itself already in just 1 month as speeding tickets are 200 plus dollars here in Fla

Reviews.Title: Cobra xrs 9745
Reviews.Author: Cecil R. Stripling
Reviews.Content: It helps a lot with warning me so I can be within the speed limit. I'm on the road a lot and drive 6 to 8 hours a day.

Reviews.Title: So far it has been awesome!
Reviews.Author: efenton
Reviews.Content: I was given this product as a Christmas present and it has almost paid for itself in just a few weeks! I have only done city driving with it, but I am looking forward to using it on the highway. It is very user friendly, has a good display, and many options/settings. I was concerned after reading a review that said the cord is not nearly long enough in a Subaru Outback, which is the car I have, but I think that the cord is the perfect length. So far I have seen nothing wrong with this product and would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Children pleased with radar detector
Reviews.Author: Debi
Reviews.Content: These were given to our three older children that do a lot of traveling in their vehicles. I have heard from them all and they really like the product.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: happy buyer
Reviews.Content: It arrived at my house fast. It does what it's supposed too. No problems with the product. It's worth the money. Great Buy!!

Reviews.Title: Savior
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: As a young driver, I tend to not take too many risks out of fear of losing my license. With this item in my car I can be more focused on what is going on around me instead of constantly being on the lookout for cops. It works when it is supposed to and the detection distance is great. It saved me four times in one day as I was traveling on a road with many cops in new speedtraps. If you have a habit of speeding, get this product and make the investment to save you a ticket that would definitely cost you more than 5 times the price of this simple protection unit

Reviews.Title: too frequent false alarm
Reviews.Author: hyperisk
Reviews.Content: I have been using it in my car (civic si 07) during mostly commuting (city & highway, Palo Alto, CA) for about a month. To minimize unnecessary hard breaking while I enjoy Honda VTEC engine, I disabled all bands except Ka. However, this one is still making false alarm so frequently that I am now ignoring most of beepings. Each day I drive for about 1 hour 30 min and it beeps more than 10 times. Each week I get well over 50 beeps but perhaps only one is real. I used a cheaper detector previously and I know false alarms do occur, but for this product I expected more than this.I can make a fair comparison with Escort x8500 because I cam carpooling with my coworker who has it. The Escort x8500 is virtually immune to any false alarm, which means whenever it beeps I know I need to slow down. I say "fair comparison" because I know Escort x8500 costs 2~3 times more.

Reviews.Title: 6th Ave Electronics: Cobra 9345 Radar/Laser Detector
Reviews.Author: tyty
Reviews.Content: The Cobra XRS 9345 is just what I wanted for everyday use during my long commute to and from work. The item was shipped promptly, and the price was the best I found online anywhere. It works well on the highway and it is a great value for the range of features it has.

Reviews.Title: didnt work!
Reviews.Author: The Cop runner
Reviews.Content: Please dont buy this item, it only receives signal from electric doors, doesnt detect cops, ive been infront, on the back, by side on the police and nothing, not even a small beep, the laser gun can see you before the thing starts beepping and even them it doesnt beep

Reviews.Title: didnt last
Reviews.Author: Princess Evelyn Milano
Reviews.Content: I've had this a little over a year and a half now, and the voice started to mess up about a month ago.  It's so muffled/garbled you cannot understand anything it says at all anymore.  Of course, it had to happen right after the warranty ran out.  Not worth the $140 I paid considering it didnt even last 2 years.

Reviews.Title: Cobra XRS 9345 Works Fine
Reviews.Author: Puffguy
Reviews.Content: This is my first ever radar detector.  Plugged it in and it worked right out of the box.  Drove from Toronto to FL and back.  Seemed to work fine with enough warning.  There was a couple of "sighting" without the unit "going off", but that may simply be a case of police not operating their radar unit....who knows?.  Anyways, for the price, I'm pretty happy with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price, so far so good
Reviews.Author: Calvin
