Reviews.Content: Nice price, works well so far. Esay to set up. I am not using it a lot because I usually don't drive too fast. Bought it after getting a speeding ticket. I only use it on highway while driving faster than 65 mph. It beeped a couple of time, but haven't seen a cop so far. It beeps when you go through EZ pass or sth. You could say it is a little sensitive, but it is totally acceptable. Good buy, I would say, if you only need it for precaution on highway.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Henry Mitchell
Reviews.Content: Got this for the wife... First week she got a ticket, they got her with a plane. The voice is now distorted. When you start the car it sounds like "sister ready" when saying "system ready"... Still finds radar.

Reviews.Title: Recently purshased. Still don't know much about it
Reviews.Author: Edwin Walker
Reviews.Content: So far i'm satisfied.  I would  probably buy another one at this point

Reviews.Title: So Far So good
Reviews.Author: L. Otero
Reviews.Content: I just got this detector this week, tomorrow I will test it good on the expressway, I know all the hideout places for cops, (try the [...] ) I tested yesterday and I was surprised when the radar went off and the policy car was more than a mile away.I will come back with more comments after this weekend.

Reviews.Title: Saved me so many times
Reviews.Author: Bil
Reviews.Content: Ok, first of all I drive fast during long trips. I mean as fast as i can. literally hitting 130 miles. This radar saved my *** more than 5 times now. it has worked against both laser and K, KU alerts. It does get false readings from doors and stuff but i can put up with that.

Reviews.Title: detector review
Reviews.Author: Bill Newman "corn larry"
Reviews.Content: No,, it sucks.  There are too many false alerts!!  Even in the middle of the Nevada desert, I get alerts but there is no one around.  And then it would go off right on top of the police.And I got a ticket because the thing picked up the waves too late.  I am going to look into getting my money back from Amazon. I ammost definately going to write the company and tell them of my displeasure of their product.  All of those "special" alerts and bands,, did not help me.  The ticket is $57.  I would say,, try another brand.I could not even rate this product,, they had no negative stars!!

Reviews.Title: Very poor performance
Reviews.Author: Jay Green
Reviews.Content: This radar detector is not sensitive enough. Most of the time, I saw cop cars before the radar detector alerted me. I have driven right past cops and the device only showed a strength rated 1 (out of 5). The last straw was when there was a cop RIGHT NEXT TO ME in the next lane, and we were stopped at a traffic light, and the radar detector didn't alert until I began to make my left turn. Only once did it ever reach a strength above 1: when I was on a completely straight road and a cop approached from afar.I returned this. Using it is pointless. My eyes can do a better job.

Reviews.Title: BAD DESIGNED PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Anthony Mendes
Reviews.Content: TOO MANY FALSE SIGNALS .  DOESN'T DETECT RADAR KA BAND VERY EFFECTIVE.  I GUESS YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR .. VERY POOR PERFORMANCE. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS TO ANYONE

Reviews.Title: My First Scanner
Reviews.Author: Reggie Torres
Reviews.Content: I can't compare this to other Scanners; it's my first one.But from what I've seen so far this thing is great. Many features, great price, easy setup, and does what it's supposed to do. I especially enjoy the compass and auto-shutup features. I'll be getting USB GPS add-on very soon.IMHO -- I wouldn't bother paying the $500 I've seen some of these other detectors go for.

Reviews.Title: Warning distance is terrible
Reviews.Author: Steph
Reviews.Content: Many many times I have been across the stop light from a cop and it didn't go off until the cop passed me....very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Didnt work...
Reviews.Author: Joel A. Duncan
Reviews.Content: Never beeped when passing cops.. Talked to a cop and he said those things dont work now because they have new technology in cop cars to kill the signal that just came out...

Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: UserinMD
Reviews.Content: The radar works good but only sometimes. Sometimes I pass by police and it doesn't ring. But it does seem to work when they have a speeding gun pointing at you. For the price I think its worth it.

Reviews.Title: sent back
Reviews.Author: steve d
Reviews.Content: bought this product at a reasonable price with high expectations.  I had to send it back i don't believe it was working properly.  I realize not all police cars have their radars turned on but just passed way to many pulled over with flashing lights and unit never went off.  I don't feel I could trust the unit to alert me when really necessary.  On two occassions I was right on top of the police car before it went off so I decided to send the unit back.  Whether or not just my unit was defective I don't know.  Product itself was easy to use and nicely designed.

Reviews.Title: Great radar detector.
Reviews.Author: sefertb
Reviews.Content: You will not be disappointed. Have owned this one for 3 years now, and have not had any problems. Great range, good looking, and has paid for itself multiple times. No better way to get a great detector, and a great price than Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Saved my A$$
Reviews.Author: the mechanic
Reviews.Content: Received my XRS9945 last night, the setup was pretty easy just need a parking lot to calibrate the compass. The next morning on my way to school it saves me from two cycle cops! Get you one its worth it. Its better than my friends $300 escort.

Reviews.Title: Radar Detector works exactly as advertised
Reviews.Author: anthony lang "parent"
Reviews.Content: The Cobra XRS 9945 Voice Alert 15 Band Radar/Laser Detector with Full-Color DataGrafix Display, Digital Compass, and Upgradeable Features, works exactly as advertised.  It was easy to install.  My only concern is the analog volume control.  The one button dimmer is great for optimum night of full sunlight viewing.  It has already saved me tickets in at least 2 states.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Alan K. Andre
Reviews.Content: Second Cobra in my history and I can say this one is better than the last.  Senisitive long range detection with those different alerts to let you know without looking what is pining you.  Compass is good idea as well.  It shows the voltage as well and that is a bonus.  Voice is clear and understandable

Reviews.Title: Must have
Reviews.Author: sterutter
Reviews.Content: This has saved me so many times. I bought another one for my dad who has a corvette and he has been extremely happy with it. No complaints. The compass function works great.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: ndw "Nick"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Cobra XRS 9545 and tested it out on my trip from Birmingham to New Orleans. I was not pleased with the performance of this unit at all. The radar detector would not go off until you were right up on the cop and even then would only show one bar as the strength and sometimes wouldn't even make a sound at all. Also, the laser detector on my unit did not function at all (I know a police officer and used his lidar gun to verify). I used this Cobra for 3 weeks around Birmingham as well, and was plagued by false alerts constantly. If you are thinking about buying this radar I would recommend saving your money and buying a halfway decent radar detector. I have returned the Cobra and just order a Beltronics V995 Vector Radar and Laser Detector (Black/Silver), after doing some research this time around. Hopefully the V995 will perform better.

Reviews.Title: Verdict is still out.
Reviews.Author: Paul M. Dunaway
Reviews.Content: Item arrived quickly but just after a few days I realized I had a defective detector. The sensitivity was way too low. Even approaching a radar sign I would see my speed long before the detector went off. Even sitting 5 feet in front of the sign the detector never went over one bar. I contacted Cobra customer service and they were very helpful. Even sent a prepaid UPS label to send it back. Waiting on the new detector to make my final call.

Reviews.Title: False alerts all the way
Reviews.Author: R. Nagarajan "Hunky223"
Reviews.Content: I decided to give this product a try and I tried it on the roads of NY, CT and NJ and it kept beeping every 2 minutes and it was false alerts all the way. Returned my product for a refund. I still have my BEL Radar Detector I bought 7 years ago and it works perfectly with false alerts. so I saw no point in replacing the existing one with this one as it was even worse...

Reviews.Title: looks but no action
Reviews.Author: pal
Reviews.Content: had the cobra for about two weeks..nice looking unit lots of features,but i found that the unit was not sensitive enough.returned it.

Reviews.Title: Go find a unit that will last...
Reviews.Author: Larry Hardison "NWBerean"
Reviews.Content: After reading many reviews of this and different models I bought this on 9/23/09.I knew there would be some false alerts. For the first month (on a road trip in early October) it worked fine. However since then this unit has begun reporting so many false alerts as to be virtually useless...not just in 1 band (X), but also, KA, POP, Spectre4.It is now November 9th and it has developed a short in the power cord over the last week. It will reboot on any minor bump in the road and ignore some larger ones. In 1 mile coming home it constantly rebooted because of the road surface - not too useful. It even rebooted when entering my driveway.Go find another product that offers quality, durability and a reasonable price. This one doesn't. This one is destined to be a high priced contribution to the landfill.

Reviews.Title: Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: anthonyabby
Reviews.Content: What the heck was I thinking?  If I'm going to buy a radar detector, then I should shell out enough money to buy one that's reliable and has some range to it.

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: Ann Graber
Reviews.Content: doesn't track police radar. the one time i was being radar-ed the cop was pointing the radar right at me and it didn't even beep. this happened multiple times. however it has helped about two times. worth it for the money and long trips but do not rely on it because it is not accurate enough

Reviews.Title: Is what it says it is.
Reviews.Author: Layton L. McCulley
Reviews.Content: Good product took me sometime to read up on it but once I got it down packed it is all good and well working as it says it will do! Only problem I have or had is that the Visor clip that they sent with it doesn't seem to fit with this Detector! Unless you attach something to it to make them both stick to each other.

Reviews.Title: bulkier and bigger than my 90's model,but it works just fine
Reviews.Author: T. Bright
Reviews.Content: Used it on day one for a 450 mile road trip-the alerts are not the same as my old cobra,so it took me a while to realize this thing was going off.It's not very loud,either,though the range is a little better.Display is nice and big,but you have to learn which alert is which to know what it's trying to tell you.So,bigger,bulkier,uglier,and quieter,but better range,features,and comes with a bracket(and a cool little quick disconnect on the detector itself for storage).Not the best,but the best in the price range,not to mention it saved me two tickets the first weekend I had it...

Reviews.Title: great only one flay I can see but it might be just me lol
Reviews.Author: Timothy Creech
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 1500 mile trip back to TX from IN. While I was in IN it saved me a ticket the first day I plugged it in. Over the trip it saved me 5 more times!! So it has definitely paid for its self!! The only problem I have with it is its not that loud but I dont hear all that great neither so says the wife lol But other than that no problems I would buy it again!!

Reviews.Title: GOES OFF ALL THE TIME.I HAVE HAD IT ABOUT A WEEK.IT'S A LITTLE EARLY TO DO A GOOD REVIEW
Reviews.Author: John Riley
Reviews.Content: I CAN HARDLY TAKE THE CONTINUES FALSE ALARMS IN THE CITY SO I UNPLUG IT.ON THE HWY  IT'S NOT AS BAD BUT HAVE PASSED A FEW COP'S ON THE SIDE OF THE ROAD TRYING TO CATCH SPEEDERS AND IT DIDN'T GO OFF.I BRAKE FOR ANYTHING ON THE SIDE OF THE ROAD ANYWAY.IT KEEP'S U ALERT WHILE DRIVING.I CHECK MY SPEED WHEN IT GOES OFF BUT I HAVE BETTER LUCK WITH MY EYES THAN THIS DETECTOR SO FAR.DETECTOR ONLY HAS TO SAVE U ONCE TO PAY FOR IT'S SELF IF IT HASN'T TRAINED U NOT TO BRAKE WHEN IT GOES OFF.I RESEARCHED RADAR DETECTORS EVERY DAY FOR A WEEK AND LIKED THE RED LITE AND OTHER CAPIBILITIES U CAN ADD TO COBRA.THE BELTRONICS VECTOR V955 IS RATED ONE OF THE BEST FOR FALSE ALARMS FOR $175.I READ U CAN BUY ONE FOR AROUND A $100 ON CYBER MONDAY.RADAR ROY RECOMMENDED COBRA XRS-9545 BEST DETECTOR UNDER $200WE'LL  SEE IF HE'S GETTING PAID OFF.

Reviews.Title: Dude All the Past reviews were Dead on this is the Cobra, That puts you ahead of the game!

Reviews.Content: OK hello, name, M@I Looked at nearly (676)reviews on this model and many other model, Find the right seller with the Best price (Dont go used)[New in Package] because then you get your warranted paperwork which is a plus!.This is not a cheapo product that sounds all alarms and over reacts to every single non-threat. This Device is smart and very pedantic when it comes to detection. keep in mind that if your in the USA the worst concern youll face is rather you want the straight cord or the stock power it comes with.I have so much more to say I am a very busy man. Look at your reviews from other customers and see if this is right for you. It's right for me and I hope you do your research before buying, this Item was valued at $160+ retail I got mine for $70 tax included Good luck and may the right luck come to you.

Reviews.Title: I just don't know
Reviews.Author: Helena Cairns
Reviews.Content: It hardly ever makes a sound, so I don't feel very secure.  Hard to believe that there can be no radar on the interstate AND the city  highways for hours.  Instructions are hard to understand.Would NOT buy again or recommend.

Reviews.Title: Mounting bracket terrible
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: So I just opened this item and I already dislike it. The mounting bracket, a simple two suction cup design, is a complete waste of time. They feel like they've been sitting around for a very long time. The rubber is hard and won't stick to anything, let alone hold the weight of the radar detector. I hope that the performance of the radar itself is better.

Reviews.Title: BAD
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: Look product ship well i had this over 2 years now after the first 3months and my first speeding ticket i unhook the sucker and keep it in my glove department (STORAGE!) The Detection on the cobra is horrible. From looking face to face with the police officer going 85 then looking at your rear-view mirror seeing the Cherry blue lights Saying "THANK YOU COBRA" its not worth the money. I use the cobra on My 1997 Honda Civic LX In California if that helps. I say do your research and get a better model and don't be like me "spend little Money" i guess its true a little more cash can get you something much better but you learn from your mistakes. GOOD LUCK.

Reviews.Content: good radar. works good and its worth getting it if you want something less expensive

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Beejssh316
Reviews.Content: I recently received the Cobra XRS 9345 14 band radar/laser detector for a gift.  I travel a lot everyday.  2hour commute to work during the week and 6-7 hours on road over weekends.  I've had it for about 2 months now and this product works great 50% of the time, and the other 50% its a complete let down. The biggest shock of this product was it's changing range of operation. Sometimes it would pick up a police car sitting 1-2 miles up the road. Other times it would not go off until I was 20 feet from the cop car. The X band goes off way too much, often false alarms, and the K band really never goes off. The laser gun also seems to have terrible range. I visibly saw the state trooper aiming the laser gun at me and the dectector still took another 3-5 seconds to go off. However, as mentioned, sometimes it works great. You're taking a 50-50 chance with this product based on my opinion.  Very disappointed for what I've come to know as a brand for Cobra.

Reviews.Title: too good at the wrong times
Reviews.Author: k19
Reviews.Content: This is a good detector but its always going off.. even if you in the middle of no where.. It also hasnt gone off for a real reason yet.. It will occasionally alert you of a cop thats near you.. but I have been radared without it going off.

Reviews.Title: good feature keep on silence
Reviews.Author: T-bone
Reviews.Content: overall the product features are good. u can disable any brand that u dont want to use. especially, x brand & k brand: this unit can let u disable it. pro mode is good for advance user. Read the manual b4 use this unit then u will know how to operate it. voice alert after the alarm signal, sounds clear and loud. some feature must turn on b4 use.  false signal not much at all.  i bought 2 of this, one for me and one for my brother. i turned the pop mode on when i'm driving on the hwy, it pick up the warning signal, but i dont know it is false or not, i didnt c any cop around.....in the city, even the cop is in front of me or next to me, but my unit never get any alert.

Reviews.Content: I bought this product and I never use it. But I gave my friend and his opinion ; If you want to escape radar you have to use it...

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Ronald Swapp
Reviews.Content: Wanted to rate it with 0 stars but it wasn't an option.I bought this from another vendor just to test it against my V1, this thing is JUNK as with most of the POS Radar Detectors out there.It goes off you don't have a clue where the threat is or how many there are.Range, your better off keeping your eyes open and keep this thing at home or in the trash better yet stay away from it.V1 picked up Ka, X and K band far sooner than this POS even went off, it's great at detecting other detectors and it even make the V1 illuminate a big J in the display for Junk detector detected.V1 vs this POS on front detection, the V1 picked up K and Ka at about 7,500 feet using stationary radar where this was at best 750'.V1 vs this POS on rear detection, the V1 picked up Ka at about 4,500 feet where this was if you're lucky at 100'.It's very prone to false alarms and not very reliable at picking up POP, tested with the help of our local PD.Another word of advice, don't use this in Canada VG2 was able to pick it up at about 1,000 feet where the V1 was totally invisible.Advice, save your money and get a V1.

Reviews.Content: I"ve traveled all across the United States with this radar detector.  It worked incredibly well, I trust it completely.  By far the best radar detector i've seen.  Also with the GPS locator, makes it extremely valuable for red light camera and speed trap areas.

Reviews.Title: COBRA XRS 9345
Reviews.Author: DISAPOINTED
Reviews.Content: FIRST DETECTOR THEY SENT ME WAS DEFECTIVE OUT OF THE BOX, I DIDNT TRUST IT AT ALL, BUT AMAZON SENT OUT ANOTHER ONE AND I RECEIVED IT FASTER THAN THE ONE I BOUGHT, I HAVE A LESSER EXPENSIVE COBRA THAT WORKS GREAT, THIS ONE I STILL DONT TRUST YET!!!!!!!!! SO FAR ITS BEEN WORKING OK, WHEN YOU BUY A RADAR DETECTOR UNTIL IT PROVES IT SELF WORTHY YOU WONT TRUST IT, I HAD A WHISTLER IT PROVED WORTHY BUT WENT OFF ALL THE TIME X BAND FALSE SIGNAL CONTINIOUSLY, THIS COBRA DOES MUTE OUT AFTER IT CHECKS THE SIGNAL, BASICLY IM STILL EVALUATEING THIS DETECTOR, IVE HAD NO TROUBLE WITH THIS ONE SO FAR, IM CHEAP AND I ALWAYS LOOK FOR DEALS THIS ONE AT 59.00 WAS A DEAL, THE BEST MOST TRUST WORTHY DETECTOR IVE EVER OWNED WAS A FUZZ BUSTER AND THEY DONT MAKE THEM ANYMORE. BEST THING TO DO IS BUY ONE AND LEARN HOW TO USE IT BECAUSE THEY ALL HAVE THE SAME TECHNOLOGY, MOST COMPANIES THAT MAKE RADAR GUNS ALSO MAKE THE DETECTOR TO DETECT THERE RADAR SIGNALS, IF YOU WANT ONE THAT WORKS CHECK TO SEE IF THE DETECTOR YOUR BUYING ALSO MAKES RADAR GUNS LIKE COBRA, BELL (OVER PRICED) OR WHISTLER, NOW IF YOU WANT THE BEST AND I DO MEAN THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE ITS WHISTLER HANDS DOWN THEY ARE UNSURPASSED WHEN IT COMES TO TAKING CARE OF THERE PRODUCTS!!!!!!!!!!!
